description.en: The objective of this course will focus on materials science principle, electro-optical technology and their related essential patents portfolio analysis. The content of the course includes: (1) material science principle, (2) material technology industry analysis, (3) material technology essential patents, (4) electro-optical technology, (5) electro-optical industry analysis, (6) electro-optical industry essential patents.

name.zh: 材料科學、光電技術及關鍵專利
name.en: Material Science, Electro-Optical Technology, and Essential Patents

description.zh: 本課程介紹研究方法，培養學生撰寫論文的基本知識與能力。
description.en: This course will introduce research methods and provide students with fundamental knowledge and competence on writing thesis.

description.zh: 「創意商」是指一個人在創意能力上的指數。本課程至少包括下述和「創意商」相關的課題：它的科學基礎，它的心理學方法，它的知識論基礎，如何培養創意的基因，如何區別個人的與在團體中所展現的創意，等等。本課程將進行系列的西方創意理論與個案探討，目的在使學習者得以培養他們的「創意商」。
description.en: “Creativity Quotient” refers to the quotient one has for her ability of creativity. The course covers at least the following topics relevant to “Creativity Quotient”: its scientific basis, its psychological methods, its epistemic foundation, the development of the gene of creativity, the difference between individual creativity and creativity in a group, etc. The course will proceed with a series of close surveys of western theories and accounts of creativity and practical cases, so that the participants of the course will cultivate their “creativity quotient. ”

description.zh: 大稻埕文創社區經營結合歷史、建築、文化、音樂、茶道、祭典與近代社會運動、歷史遺跡，組合成豐富的大稻埕文化，藉由對此社區活動的認識，結合現代文創元素，讓學子對台北的古遺跡有更深刻的認識，並打造「大稻埕」成為歷史街區活化的國際品牌，期盼在提升台灣學子的「就業即戰力」與「國際移動力」的同時，也成為當今我國文化外交戰略的重要環節。
description.en: The community management of Dadaocheng creative zone combines her own history, architecture, culture, music, tea ceremony, ceremonies and modern social movements, historical relics into a rich specific Dadaocheng culture, through propagating her community activities combined with modern creative elements.  We expect our students to improve their " employment agility" and "international mobility", by enabling them to have a deeper understanding of specific Dadaocheng culture. And then, Dadaocheng being an international brand is an important part of Taiwanese cultural diplomacy strategy.

description.zh: 從綜合材料來分析當代藝術表現的造形方式，介紹各個成型技法與造形的相互關係，使學生理解材料與造形表現上的關連。經由實際專題發想及協助製作的過程，提高學生在多種媒材成型應用上的操作能力，以及造形上量感與結構性造形的創造力。課程同時安排訪問藝術家、相互合作、主動蒐集資料與產出呈現的方式，促使學生主動學習並相互關心他人作品與自身的關係
description.en: From the materials to analyze the shape of contemporary art expression, introduce the relationship between each technique, so that students would understand the relationship between materials and making processes. Through the practical project, students' ability to operate in a variety of media forming applications, as well as the creativity of volume and structural shapes. The course also arranges studio visiting, mutual cooperation, collection of materials and exhibition, prompting students to actively learn and care about the relationship between art and human.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹企業的管理系統如何有效的計畫、設計和分析及實行，包括管理系統的分析、可行性研究、系統設計、系統發展、雛形設計、測試、文件製作和評估等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to provide the students with a broad understanding of information systems, information technologies, information systems development and management in business and other organizations.

description.zh: 本課程主要闡述財務管理中最重要的投資決策、融資決策與短期資金管理決策之基本架構及企業經理人之財務決策，配合各項相關議題進行個案研討，結合資訊工具與軟體運用、以深入淺出方式介紹財務管理之基本觀念及理論架構，並搭配財務軟體、財金資料庫、與財金資訊網站的應用。藉由這些資訊工具與技術，將財務管理的觀念與原理加以運用於重要的融資與投資決策制定。課程內容涵蓋：金融市場與金融機構、財務報表與現金流量分析、財務規劃與預測、風險與報酬、債券與股票之評價、資金成本、資本預算決策、資本結構與財務槓桿、營運資金管理、股利政策…等。本課程結合財務管理實務並融入財務決策研討，以培育理論與實務兼備之財務管理人才。透過本課程之修習，期許學生能具備財務管理領域之學科知識與專業技術整合能力、獨立研究之能力、判斷性思考與決策能力，以及制訂並解決財務管理問題之能力。
description.en: The course focus on the three most important decisions of the financial management: the investment decisions, the financing decisions and short-term capital management and financial decisions of corporate managers, and various related topics with case studies. This course combines information and software tools to use; the major goal of this course is to help students understanding the basic principles and theories of investments. By mixing explanation and implementation using financial software and database, it can give students the skills to conduct a sophisticated assessment on investment decisions. The major topics including: Financial markets and financial institutions, the financial statements and cash flow analysis, financial planning and forecasting, risk and return, bond and stock pricing, the cost of capital, capital budgeting decisions, capital structure and financial leverage, working capital management, dividend policy, mergers and acquisitions, etc. This course combines b

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This seminar focuses on report writing of research, group study, and training of students' research ability.

description.zh: 本課程能夠讓修課學生靈活的運用各種大數據探勘與分析演算法、社群文字探勘及機器學習演算法等技術，分析各項金融資料。透過實際金融數據分析案例及實務資料操做，補強資訊背景學生之金融產業知識，並讓修課同學了解資訊科技於金融資料分析之實務應用，以培育業界金融科技人才。課程內容以模組的方式進行，包括：「數據分析」、「機器學習」以及「金融大數據實務」。課程也將擷取網路中的開放財經數據，進行金融資料之預處理、分析及預測結果之驗證，協助修課學生建構高預測能力及穩定性之數據探勘模型。
description.en: This course teaches students to use various techniques of big data mining and analysis algorithms, text mining of social media, and machine learning algorithms to analyze financial data. In this course, by case study and open software operation (such as R ), we will strengthen the financial knowledge of information background students. Also, the students can understand how to select and well organize various information technologies (particular the data analysis technique) to analyze financial data. The course is organized in modules, including "Data Analysis", "Machine Learning" and "Big Data Practice for Financial Data analysis." The course will also teach students to collect open financial data from the Internet, and experience the KDD process, including: data pre-processing and data analysis, to establish a prediction model with high forecasting ability and stability.

description.zh: 本課程主要是在於介紹一些駭客常用的攻擊方法和可能使用工具，並藉由這些技術的解說讓學生瞭解實際駭客的攻擊行為與思維模式，進而習得如何保護所管理的網路或資訊系統免於被攻擊成功。課程中將輔以實機操作，教導您如何利用現有電腦資源掃描及測試系統的安全問題，藉以保護系統安全，課程中將加強實際的上機操作，藉由上課所模擬的網路環境中，讓同學能夠實際感受攻擊的可能實況
description.en: This course is mainly to introduce network and system attack methods and security assessment tools used by hackers, and to explain the attack behavior and thinking strategy of hackers through the explanation of these technologies. In addition, this course teaches students learn how to protect the managed network or information system to against from being compromised successfully. The course will be supplemented by practices, and teaching students how to use the existing tools to scan and test the security of the system. In order to protect the security of the system, the course will focus on the system and network practices, which can let the students feel the possible network and system attacks.

notes: 資財三四甲、 碩合開 / 科研240教室

description.zh: 來自於內部與外部的攻擊使企業在系統及網路保護遭遇許多挑戰，為了有效控制企業風險，政府在內部控制相關法規明確要求資訊系統相關的內部控制，而電腦稽核為確保內部控制的關鍵角色。本課程內容以國際電腦稽核師(CISA)認證的各項領域內容為主。期望學生能夠對於瞭解資訊系統稽核及其風險管理相關概念有初步的瞭解，進而瞭解資訊安全及資訊系統稽核的機制與手法，作為協助學生順利考取國際電腦稽核師(CISA)認證碁石。
description.en: Internal and external attacks have caused enterprises to encounter many challenges in system and network protection. In order to effectively control enterprise risks, the government's accounting regulations explicitly require information system-related internal controls, and computer audit is a key role for ensuring internal control. The content of this course is based on the content of various fields of the International Computer Auditor (CISA) certification. Students are expected to have a preliminary understanding of the information system audit and its risk management related concepts, and then understand the mechanisms and techniques of information security and information system auditing. Finally, it is expected as a way to help students successfully obtain the CISA certification.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於從科學哲學層次、研究方法層次、與實際操作層次探討設計研究的本質，內容包括界定設計研究問題、選用適當的量化或質性研究方法與特定工具、研究結果詮釋、案例解析、以及論文寫作等，俾使同學具備研究之基礎觀念以及進行創作或理論論文寫作之能力。研究方法一強調量化研究，課程內容包含研究的基本概念、文獻探討、研究問題、研究變項、研究假設、研究設計、資料蒐集與分析、研究工具、研究樣本、研究倫理與研究論文撰寫等。教學以課堂講授與論文研討與發表為主要方式，並以隨堂測驗、報告與分組討論與發表為評量依據。
description.en: The aims of this course are to explore the nature of design research at the three various levels of scientific philosophy, research methods, and practical execution. The contents involve the introduction of defining the design problems, selecting the quantitative or qualitative research methods and specific instruments, interpretation of research results, case studies, as well as writing a thesis.This research methods one focus on quantitative research that content details includes fundamental concept of research, literature review, research problem, research variables, research hypothesis, research design, data collection and analysis, research instruments, research samples, research ethics and writing up. The teaching methods include lectures, paper discussion and presentation based on the course assessment of assigned project, panel discussion and individual/group presentation.

notes: 排一般教室,限本系生修課,選課人數上限30人

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於研討互動設計、互動媒體、互動藝術之相關研究專題，以文獻研讀、論文研讀討論以及個案研究為重點，藉由密集討論、書面報告以及設計專題之之研究與實作，學生可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗，並具備研究、分析、實作之能力。本所以結合電子資訊、機電、人文、設計與藝術等各領域的學生，以整合培育互動媒體設計專業人才，因此，本課程之另一主要學習目標為建構一多元領域交互學習的環境，以專題導向式為學習模式，可分別組合具設計、藝術、資訊、機電等專長的研究生，協同完成互動媒體設計專題的研究，或是透過互動媒體設計個案研討、互動媒體設計專題創作的方式進行。教學將以課堂講授、論文研討與發表以及專題實作為主，並以報告、分組討論與發表以及實作作品為評量方式。
description.en: This course is to explore the fields of interaction design, interactive media and interactive art and focus on the literature study, paper discussion and case studies. With panel discussion, research report and design practice, graduate students can be able to learn the ability of research, analysis and practice by effectively exchange opinions and personal experience. The aim of graduate of interactive media design is to integrate different disciplines from computer science, mechatronics, human-culture and design and art so as to foster the professional of interactive media design. Therefore, one of the aims of this course is to construct  multi-disciplines learning environment which perform a topic-oriented study model. This study model formulates the graduate students of design, art, information and mechatronic disciplines to collaborate an interactive media design project. It may execute interactive media design by working with the form of case study or design creation. The teachin

name.en: Special Topics on Interactive Media Design (I)

notes: 排一般教室,限本系生修課,選課人數上限40人

description.zh: 本課程規劃的目標為以互動設計的理論為基礎，實務導向為原則，使學習者能將學術界的理論與產業界的實務加以結合以充實對於互動設計具有全面性的了解。學習的內容包含互動設計系統構成要素、理論與實務基礎、互動設計方法與技術、科技支援與應用、認知心理、情境設計以及電腦支援協同合作等單元，各單元並包含不同互動設計個案的研討，使理論能與實務進行驗證。課程亦安排至相關領域業界的參訪，以加深對於互動設計實務的印象與了解。
description.en: The course aims to develop broad understanding on interaction design for students, based on theory and practice course structure. Course topics include essential factors of interactive system, interaction design theory and practice, interaction design methods and techniques, technical support and application, cognitive psychology, scenario design and CSCW. Course also incorporates case studies and company visits to enhance the understanding of integrating theory and practice.

notes: 排一般教室,本系生修課,選課人數上限30人

description.zh: 本課程的目的在於培養學生具備以下的能力：1. 使學生具備能夠把「抽象概念」轉換成實務設計的基本能力。2. 培養學生有美感欣賞與基本應用技巧的能力。3. 訓練學生具有獨立思考與解決問題的視覺構成能力。4. 具備認識感官資訊處理過程以及傳遞原理的基本能力。5. 能了解視覺、聽覺以及空間互動資訊如何運作以及應用的能力。6. 學習如何運用相關的方法、整合相關專業知識與技能於資訊設計上。
description.en: This course is expected to train students to be equipped with the following abilities: 1. Ability to transforming the abstract ideas into practical design. 2. Ability of aesthetic appreciation and basic application skills. 3. Visual construction ability of independent thinking and problem-solving. 4. Understanding of perceived information processing and communication principle. 5 Understanding of knowledge and application of visual, acoustic and spacial interaction information. 6. Learning how to apply relevant methods and integrate knowledge and techniques to practical information design.

notes: 排光華409,限本系碩一入學前為程式背景同學必選修課程

description.zh: 本課程介紹整合即時影像、即時音訊、實體裝置、及相關表演科技（如燈光控制、各類感應器應用等）之技術與應用實務，並藉由圖形化、物件導向程式設計系統，引導未有程式設計經驗的視覺設計者或輔助已有程式設計能力者，以更有效率的方式進行相關互動系統設計，藉以達成互動裝置、表演科技、與表演藝術之整合。
description.en: This course introduces the technology that help integrates real-time video, audio, installations, and associated performance arts technology (such as lighting control, the application of various types of sensors, etc.) into performing arts. Through a graphical, object-oriented programming system, the course is intended to help visual designers with no programming experiences or to assist experienced programmers to efficiently design the interactive systems that combine interactive installations, performance arts technology, and performing arts itself as a whole.

name.en: Interactive Installation and Performing Arts Technology

notes: 日職碩合開,排進修部教室

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於介紹使用者經驗設計之理論與研究方法。藉由本課程的學習，學生能習得互動設計過程中所需要之關鍵概念 - 以使用者經驗為中心之設計。課程以人-機-境之架構為基礎進行相關知識之講授，並透過相關研究案例之研討、方法之操作以及設計研究之進行了解其原理。課程內容包含人物誌、使用者經驗與需求、互動環境、使用者研究以及認知心理基礎等。教學將以課堂講授、文獻閱讀以及研究方法操作等方式進行，並以報告繳交、分組討論與發表為評量方式。
description.en: This course is focused on introducing the theories, application and research of User-Centered Design (UCD). In this course, students can understand the key element, UCD, of interactive design. This course is set up under the structure of Human-Machine-Scenario theory and case study. The contents include user experience and requirements, interactive scenario, usability design and evaluation, user-centered product design and development, design psychology and universal design. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, professional seminar and case study, and evaluated by students' reports, group discussion and presentation.

notes: 日職碩合開,排進修部教室

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機械與自動化科技相關技術及產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等，可重覆修習。
description.en: Case study, workshop, group discussion, seminars, mechanical engineering and automation in modern Industries.

notes: ◎機電科博和機械自動化、車輛外生班合開

description.zh: 本課程是教導學生金融科技的基本概念，使學生能夠建立金融科技的創新應用。內容包括:金融科技概論、金融科技商業模式、P2P 借貸、虛擬貨幣、雲端服務、第三方支付、群眾募資、P2P 匯兌、區塊鏈、跨境電商、程式交易、機器人理財與期末專題製做。
description.en: This course is to instruct students the basic concepts of financial technology and to enable students to develop innovative applications of financial technology. The contents include introduction to financial technology, business models of financial technology, P2P lending, virtual money, third-party payment, crowd funding, P2P remittance, blockchain, cross-border e-commerce, program trading, and robotic financial advisory.

description.zh: 本課程在培養同學創業的知識與思維，以及了解營運模式如何應用在商業活動裡。本課程包含: 創業精神的想法和行動、從失敗中學習、設計思考、市場測試、機會衡量、營運模式建立、價值主張、永續經營、企業倫理等議題。
description.en: The course is to encourage students to have the ideas of entrepreneurship and to establish the abilities of running a business. This course is focused on: entrepreneurial thought and action, learning from failure、design thinking、opportunity evaluation、market tests、the development of business model、value propositions、network、sustainable and business ethics.

description.zh: 此課程教學目標在於幫助學生們針對未來就業市場，了解若要能有效地行銷，需具備之相關行銷概念、策略、技巧及明白行銷在公司策略中之角色定位。為因應全球國際化，課程也將特別著墨於顧客行銷與企業行銷之相似與不相似處。除此之外，還將包含行銷目標市場定位、行銷市場研究，最重要的是如何整合相關資源，作行銷策略之規劃、執行，並讓同學們擁有行銷人才需具備之相關技能。
description.en: The purpose of this course is try to help students prepare to operate in and contribute to the 21st century. Regardless of whether a person intends to work in a business, for the government, or in a nonprofit organization, the concepts, strategies, and techniques of effective marketing are relevant. This course is: Providing from fundamental concepts through the major tasks associated with marketing to the strategic role of marketing in an organization. Bringing early attention to the global nature of marketing. Emphasizing the similarities as well as the differences between consumer and business marketing. Combining demand forecasting with its logical antecedents-segmentation, targeting, and position. Covering marketing research, after students have been exposed to consumer and business markets and segmentation. Integrating planning, implementation, and evaluation to provide a broad strategic context after students have a grasp of what marketing entails.

description.zh: 本課程介紹管理會計和控制等之成本會計概念介紹，本課程之目的在了解管理會計之實務與應用內涵，並藉以設計及發展管理資訊系統另外，本課程也針對與管會相關之介紹(just-in-time, balanced scorecards, profitability center, investment center …等)與管理決策(外包或自製, 增加產品線,績效評估…等)
description.en: This course deals with management accounting and control both within a micro-behavioural and within an organisational theory perspective. The aim is to provide an understanding of the developments in management accounting and control theory and practice and the implications of critical variables that affect the design, development and operation of management accounting and control systems. Practical aspects of management accounting are mainly examined through computer assisted learning (CAL). Students are expected to cover the prescribed reading on their own, and to perceive the taught seminars as the opportunity to ask questions and to offer their views at any time.

description.zh: 本課程探討資訊系統在現代組織中所扮演的角色，課程重點將放在企業電子化和電子商務，同學在修課過後將具備相關知識。課堂中的資訊實務技術演練，將有助於同學有效率地解決相關問題。
description.en: This course provides the knowledge you need to understand the role of information systems in modern organizations, with particular focus on E-commerce and E-business. Along with skills learned in your functional area, knowledge from this course will help you effectively use information technology for solving business problems.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於研討互動設計、互動媒體、互動藝術之相關研究專題，以文獻研讀、論文研讀討論以及個案研究為重點，藉由密集討論、書面報告以及設計專題之之研究與實作，學生可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗，並具備研究、分析、實作之能力。本所以結合電子資訊、機電、人文、設計與藝術等各領域的學生，以整合培育互動媒體設計專業人才，因此，本課程之另一主要學習目標為建構一多元領域交互學習的環境，以專題導向式為學習模式，可分別組合具設計、藝術、資訊、機電等專長的研究生，協同完成互動媒體設計專題的研究，或是透過互動媒體設計個案研討、互動媒體設計專題創作的方式進行。教學將以課堂講授、論文研討與發表以及專題實作為主，並以報告、分組討論與發表以及實作作品為評量方式。

With panel discussion, research report and design practice, graduate students can be able to learn the ability of research, analysis and practice by effectively exchange opinions and personal experience. The aim of graduate of interactive media design is to integrate different disciplines from computer science, mechatronics, human-culture and design and art so as to foster the professional of interactive media design. Therefore, one of the aims of this course is to construct  multi-disciplines learning environment which perform a topic-oriented study model. This study model formulates the graduate students of design, art, information and mechatronic disciplines to collaborate an interactive media design project. It may execute interactive media design by working with the form of case study or design creation. The teachin

name.en: Special Topics on Interactive Media Design (I)

notes: 限本系生修課,選課人數上限12人

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於從科學哲學層次、研究方法層次、與實際操作層次探討設計研究的本質，內容包括界定設計研究問題、選用適當的量化或質性研究方法與特定工具、研究結果詮釋、案例解析、以及論文寫作等，俾使同學具備研究之基礎觀念以及進行創作或理論論文寫作之能力。研究方法一強調量化研究，課程內容包含研究的基本概念、文獻探討、研究問題、研究變項、研究假設、研究設計、資料蒐集與分析、研究工具、研究樣本、研究倫理與研究論文撰寫等。教學以課堂講授與論文研討與發表為主要方式，並以隨堂測驗、報告與分組討論與發表為評量依據。

The contents involve the introduction of the definition of the design problems, selecting the quantitative or qualitative research methods and specific instruments, interpretation of research results, case studies, as well as writing a thesis.

notes: 限本系生修課,選課人數上限12人

description.zh: 每週以專題座談，討論專班師生各進行中的研究計畫。
description.en: A weekly seminar discusses the current progress of individual projects.

notes: 限本系生修課,選課人數上限12人,黃儀婷

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論Case Study, Seminar
description.en: Case Study, Seminar

notes: ◎機電科博和機械自動化、車輛外生班合開

description.zh: 本課程提供學生們一個可以改善他們的科技英文寫作技巧的環境，內容將包括：1. 扼要複習英文句型與文法，2. 撰寫論文常發生的錯誤，3. 分享論文審稿的經驗，4. 提供淺顯實用的寫作原則，5. 同儕分享讀論文與寫作的錯誤心得。
description.en: This course provides an environment to help students improving their English skill in writing technical paper or thesis. What will be included in the class are: 1. concise review of sentence structure and grammar, 2. frequent writing mistakes of paper or report, 3. share of the experience in paper review, 4. offering simple and practical writing principles, 5. share the experience in reading and writing papers.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電科技相關技術及產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等，可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Workshop, Group discussion, Seminars, Mechatronics in Modern Industries.

notes: ◎機電科博和機械自動化外生班合開

description.zh: 本課程之目標為增進研究生之英文閱讀能力與寫作技巧，介紹英文科技論文的慣用語法、用字與閱讀技巧及分析撰寫英文報告與學術論文之章法與組織要領。
description.en: The object of this course is to improve reading ability and writing skill for graduate students. This course introduces grammar, terms and phrases that are frequently used in English technical articles. Structures of English essay and thesis will also be explained.

description.zh: 本課程目的在提升學生在科技與服務創新的知識及了解其各種不同的特性本課程旨在討論服務業可能衍生的經營策略，尤其是與網際網路相關的各種新興的服務產業。
description.en: This is an advanced course for Master students to enhance their theoretical foundation in Technology and Service Innovation. Issues involved are: Systematic View of Technology Innovation; Service Innovation; Service Management; New Service Development

description.zh: 本課程提供所有博士生共同參與研究討論的園地。將進行設計專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: This course is a joint seminar for all the doctoral students, which will be progressed by paper presentation of special topics on design issues, giving lectures, and group meeting.

notes: 博一選課，請依分組&共同討論上課時間

description.zh: 為追求「永續發展與人本健康」之目的，使既有與新建的居住環境，配合我國「室內空氣品質管理法」規範下運作，提昇民眾居住環境健康品質效益，針對病態建築之環境問題，其涵蓋醫療、法律、建築、化學、生物等領域，綜合診斷以進行改善。本課程為第一階段之系列課程，其內容包括： 一.健康環境概念：說明何謂「病態建築」，探討室內空氣與健康之關係。 二.建築物污染源：探討來自各建築材料的化學物質逸散及其對人體健康之影響，並提出室內污染物質濃度減低對策。 三.生物性污染源：探討黴菌、蹣、白蟻及寵物等帶來的室內空氣污染。 四.診斷技術：說明室內空氣品質診斷方法及病態建築改善之專業技術，配合案例介紹探討新、舊建築物室內環境品質的設計預防、診斷改善技術。
description.en: The main goal of this class is to pursue sustainable development and human health. In order to enhance the quality of residential and living environment in both existing and new-build dwellings, the course will cover important principles and topics in sick building environment, including medical, regulation, and architecture, chemical and biological. Specific contents include: (1)Conception of healthy environment: To explain the "sick building" and explore the association between indoor air and health.(2)Pollution source from buildings: To investigate the chemicals emission from building materials and their effect on human health, and get the countermeasures on reduce the indoor pollutants.(3)Pollution source from Biological: To investigate the indoor air pollution that cause by the mold, mites, termites, and pets.(4)Diagnostic techniques: To improved indoor air quality and sick building by diagnostic methods, with the case studies to prevent indoor environmental quality on new and old

description.zh: 本課程將包含使用者經驗設計的基礎，以及使用者研究量測的內涵及方法。本課程中，將透過課堂上課、討論、以及實習的方式，介紹使用者研究的實際案例、評估模式、團隊合作方法、設計與評估工具、實踐思維、挑戰、以及實際執行的程序。預期學生將於本課程中，透過分組獲得使用者經驗在互動設計、空間設計以及產品設計上，有關使用者研究的設計、評估、施行、以及質化與量化分析量測評估的知識與方法。
description.en: This course will cover the fundamentals of user experience design and provide the students with insights into the measurement of user research. The real-life processes, challenges, considerations, tools, team works, models and case studies of user research are introduced in this course by lecturing, discussing and practicing methods. Students are expecting to learn user experience principles, to designing, evaluating, implementing and measuring user experience in both qualitative and quantitative methods in the aspect of interaction design, space design and product design individually.

name.zh: 使用者經驗設計與評量

notes: 核心選修(設計博)，設計博與互動碩、互動外生專班合開

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 課程兩個主要目標為光譜學方法及分離方法。光譜學方法內容含紫外、可見、紅光、核磁、x-ray等光譜法。電子譜及質譜也將被討論。分離方法方面有液層、氣層、膠層等層析法。分離後串聯之光譜分析也會學習。
description.en: Two major goals of this course are spectroscopy and separation methods. Spectroscopy methods include ultraviolet, visible, infrared, nuclear magnetic, and x-ray spectroscopies.Election and mass spectrometry are also included. Separation methods are: gas, liquid, and gel chromatographies. In addition, GC-MS,LC-MS, GC-IR, etc. will be studied.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

notes: 外籍生或博士以上,化工所和EOMP合開

description.zh: 本課程介紹如何將電化學技術應用於生物燃料電池上。生物燃料電池的觸媒主要是由酵素或是微生物甚至是生物細胞所組成，反應過程區分為電子直接轉移(mediatorless)與間接轉移(mediator)，並介紹此各種生物燃料電池的原理及應用，個別討論電池之反應過程、電池電極材料、電化學修飾電極及各種不同電池電解質溶液等個別元件。
description.en: The aim and purpose of this course is to introduce and expand the electrochemistry to develop the biofuel cells. Generally the catalysts of biofuel cell are composed by enzymes, microbial, creature cells and the bio-reduction process. In the biofuel cells the reaction process can be distinguished into mediator less and mediator transfer process. In this course, we will introduce the principle, reaction process and the application of biofuel cells. Especially, a detailed study about the utilization of film modified electrodes and different electrolyte solutions for the development of biofuel cells.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

notes: 外籍生或博士以上,化工所、生化所和EOMP合開

Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.en: This course provides an environment to help students improving their English skill in writing technical paper or thesis. What will be included in the class are: 1. concise review of sentence structure and grammar, 2. frequent writing mistakes of paper or report, 3. share of the experience in paper review, 4. offering simple and practical writing principles, 5. share the experience in reading and writing papers.

Invited Speakers are well-known scholars in areas related to environmental engineering and management. Graduate students or thesis advisors are also invited to report research results of their graduate studies.

description.zh: 現代控制理論簡介、線性空間分析、狀態方程式及響應，可控制性及可觀測性、穩定性分析、狀態回授及估測、控制器設計及應用、觀測

description.en: 1. To familiarize students with fuzzy logic and fuzzy inference. 2. To familiarize students with designing controllers based on fuzzy inference. 3. To familiarize students with system modeling through fuzzy rules.

description.en: Switched-capacitor circuits, Oscillators, Continuous-time filters, Phase-locked loop, Nonlinearity and mismatch, Short-channel effects and device models, Layout and packaging for analog IC.

name.zh: 高等類比積體電路設計

description.zh: 1.永磁電機理論 2.控制法則分析與模擬 3.動態特性分析 4.近代應用介紹
description.en: 1.Basic theory of operation 2. Control strategies analysis and simulation 3. Dynamic performance analysis 4. Introduction to recent applications of the PMSM.

description.zh: 1.簡介2.線性區段碼3.循環碼4.迴旋碼5.編碼調變
description.en: 1.Introduction2.Linear Block Codes3.Cyclic Codes4.Convolutional Codes5.Coded Modulation

description.zh: 本課程介紹電腦科學中圖形識別的基本原理與相關技術，使學生了解各種圖形識別的分類方法，經由對分類問題的分析，瞭解如何將輸入樣本依不同特性加以分類，並熟悉圖形識別系統之相關議題如：分割、特徵擷取、分類、後處理、訓練、監督/非監督式學習、機器學習，進而了解分類問題，增進其解決實際圖形識別分類問題的能力。課程內容包括下列課題：圖形識別概論, Bayesian Decision Theory, Maximum-Likelihood, 非參數法學習, K-Nearest Neighbor Estimation, The Nearest-Neighbor Rule, Positive Boolean Function多分類器, Linear Discriminant Functions，高維資料分類, 分類正確率評估(Accuracy Assessments)及其他重要的應用，例如: 文件分析、生物辨識、影像監控、遙測影像分類、醫療診斷、資料探勘等概念，最後並透過相關論文的研讀及討論，了解近代圖形識別的最新發展趨勢。
description.en: The course includes: Introduction to Pattern Recognition, Bayesian Decision Theory, Maximum-Likelihood & Bayesian Parameter Estimation, Non-Parametric Classification - Density Estimation, K-Nearest Neighbor Estimation, The Nearest-Neighbor Rule, Multi-Classifier - Positive Boolean Function, Linear Discriminant Functions, Pattern Recognition of High Dimensional Data Sets, Pattern Recognition for Remote Sensing Images, Biometric Certification, Video Surveillance, Accuracy Assessments and Other Related Topics.

description.zh: 此課程主要是含蓋無線通訊基頻訊號處理的理論基礎與系統架構，探討無線通道所能提供的通道容量以及可靠通訊。而大部分的課程內容會以目前熱門的多輸入多輸出(MIMO)傳輸為背景而進行探討。課程綱要如下:1.無線通道模型2.多樣性3.通道容量4.MIMO I: 空間多工5.MIMO II: 通道容量與多工架構6.MIMO III:多樣性與多工間取捨7.MIMO IV: 多使用者通訊
description.en: This course provides thefundamental theories and architectures for baseband wireless communications. It is concerned that how reliable communication can be achieved and what is the capacity a channel can provide. Much attention will be focused on the newly developed technology, referred to as multiple-inputmultiple-output (MIMO) transmission.Course outline:1.The Wireless Channel 2.Diversity3.Capacity of Wireless Channels4.MIMO I: Spatial Multiplexing 5.MIMO II: Capacity and Multiplexing Architectures6.MIMO III: Diversity-Multiplexing Tradeoff7.MIMO IV: Multiuser Communication

description.zh: 1.陶瓷絕緣體之性質2.陶瓷電容材料3.壓電及光電陶瓷4.磁性陶瓷5.陶瓷感應器：理論及實務6. ZnO變阻器之應用及特性7. 多層陶瓷技術8. 高電導陶瓷
description.en: This course is a special topics of Dielectrical Materials.

description.zh: 對無機化合物之結構，化學性質等，利用量子化學，群論及結晶化學等加以探討。以配合天然礦物之形成，產狀，地球化學及環境化學等學科之授課內容。
description.en: The chemical structure and properties of inorganic compounds, which are useful for the following courses: the forming and occurrence of minerals, earth and environmental chemistry, will be discussed by using quantum chemistry, group theory and crystallography.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程透過原理解說與系統實作，使學生掌握社群媒體API介接技術，並能運用軟體工程方法，設計對話機器人(Conversational Bot)系統，應用於客服、零售、金融與製造等領域。課程內容包括下列模組：Line及WeChat社群訊息接口，對話訊息格式，Google Dialogflow及IBM Watson Assistant 對話流程開發平台，API流量與安全管理平台，GCP(Google Cloud Platform)及AWS(Amazon Web Service)雲端系統開發框架。藉由程式實作及期末專題設計，引導學生掌握人工智慧語意分析技術，整合後台知識庫與大數據，進而設計對話機器人應用系統。
description.en: This course provides students with the knowledge and skills to design intelligent conversational bot application systems using Line Messaging API and WeChat Open Platform.  Course spans a variety of technologies such as natural language understanding tools, Google Dialogflow, IBM Watson Assistant, API management framework, GCP (Google Cloud Platform) and AWS (Amazon Web Service) cloud platform services to design and manage conversation flows for intelligent customer service systems.  Programming exercises and term projects are included to help students understand the basic ideas and practical tools in intelligent conversational bot system design.

name.zh: 社群媒體與對話機器人系統設計
name.en: Social Media and Chatbot System Design

description.zh: 1.數位影像處理的基礎 2.影像的轉換 3.影像的加強 4.影像的復原 5.彩色影像的處理6.影像的壓縮 7.影像的分割與特徵抽取 8.影像的表達及描述 9.影像的辨認與解釋10.導航與醫學影像
description.en: 1.Digital image fundamentals 2.Image transforms. 3.Image enhancement 4. Image restoration 5. Color image processing. 6. Image compression. 7. Image segmentation and feature detection 8. Representation and desciption 9. Recogmition and interpretation  10. Applications: ALV navigation and medical image.

description.en: This course will cover the examples of analysis of the mechanical, thermal, electrical, optical and chemical properties, and the structure, morphology, and rheology of polymers.

description.zh: 本課程將教授組織工程技術之基本原理及其應用。課程內容包括幹細胞技術、細胞與組織之物理化學性質、細胞之生長曲線與特性、細胞與組織培養、基因轉殖、細胞與組織分離技術、細胞支架之生醫材料、組織工程產品之檢測，以及組織工程產品上市流程等。
description.en: This course will illustrate the basic principles and applications of tissue engineering technologies. The content is consists of stem cell technologies, properties of cells and tissues, cellular-fate process, cell and tissue culture, gene transfer, cell and tissue separation, biomaterials for scaffold, testing of tissue engineered medical products (TEMPs), and the commercialization process for TEMPs.

The contents of this course are listed as following: 1.Design concepts to logic circuits 2.Structure, data type and operator 3.Combinationa-circuit and Sequential-circuit 4.Function/process and task/attribute 5.Architectural design 6.Functional and timing simulation 7.Synthesizer 8.State machine design 9.Pipelined process 10.RAM and ROM 11.ASIC design and implementation.

description.zh: 研究生須要具有整合、分析資料與創新思維、寫作能力以完成碩博士論文。本課程主要包括：一、 良好研究特質，二、 研究規劃， 三、學習方法， 四、 創新思維方法 五、 寫作方法， 六、 簡報方法， 七、 研究實務練習
description.en: Graduate students need to integrate information and innovative insights to successfully achieve a master or Ph.D degree. The course includes:1. Characteristics of good researchers. 2. Research planning. 3. Learning method. 4. Innovative thinking.5. Writing method. 6. Present method.7. Research design practice

description.zh: 1.需求面管理與節約能源2.負載管理策略與成效評估3.負載監控與需量控制管理4.汽電共生及其他能源應用5.配電自動化與配電管理實務

description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 因應高齡化社會的來臨，本課程探討高齡者的健康、住家、行動力、通訊、休閒和工作等議題，以使用者為中心發掘問題，提出改善高齡者生活之產品、環境或服務設計，以達到在地安養的目的。
description.en: To cope with the coming of the aging society, issues about health, housing, mobility, communication, leisure and work for senior citizens are discussed in the class.  User-centred approaches are adopted to explore the difficulties the senior citizens encountered in their daily life.  Product, environment of services designs are proposed to improve the living quality for the senior citizens.  Hopefully, the concept of aging in place will be realized.

description.zh: 本課程透過案例研究與設計實作，幫助學生學習工業設計師應該具備的物聯網基本概念，以及基於設計思考的物聯網產品設計原理與方法。
description.en: By case studies and design projects, this course is to help students learn the basic concepts of Internet of Things (IoT), and the principles and methods of IoT product design based with design thinking.

name.zh: 工業設計與物聯網專題
name.en: Special topics in Industrial Design for the Internet of Things

notes: 工設三四與日碩合開；日碩上限10人

description.zh: 21世紀的工業設計師已不能再靜待市場研究及產品企劃人員提供產品設計規範，而應以使用者代言人、及企業產品開發整合者身分，主動參與產品策略與企劃，並以視覺化技術協助相關人員作橫向溝通。因此，「產品創新設計策略與企劃」課程主要目標在教導學生以「前瞻性的視野」，透過創新設計的步驟與方法，策劃出符合企業技術及經營體質，並且能滿足市場及使用者使用情況需求的產品。本課程將以理論、方法、案例研討及個案研究方式進行。
description.en: The function of industrial design in the 21st  century, will no longer waiting for the product definition from the marketing and product planning, It will become a integrator and visualizer during the product innovation strategic phase, and concerning to the user's needs.          	Product Innovation Strategy will guide the enterprise looking beyond their current operation to match their technologies and the distinct competencies with emerging the user and the market needs.The contents of this topic will include theory, methodology, and practical case study.

notes: 工設三四與日職碩合開；一教1F

description.zh: 本課程探討以人為本的設計思考與以系統化為基礎的計算思維，如何用以問題解決、系統設計與人類行為理解，包括同理心觀察的人類學方法、創意發展的比喻與類比思考方法、邏輯思維方法、巨大複雜系統設計與評估的工程思維方法，以及複雜性、智能、心理、人類行為的理解的科學思維方法。
description.en: This course is to explore some special topics about the approaches of human-centered design thinking and system-based computational thinking to problem solving, systematic design, and understanding human behavior, including the methods of empathy observation, metaphor and analogy, logic, complex systems, artificial intelligence, and psychology.

name.zh: 設計思考與計算思維專題
name.en: Special topics in design thinking and computational thinking

description.zh: 藉由國內外設計競賽主題與產學合作設計案進行實際演練，著重於資料蒐集、商品分析、創新構想與成果表達之進階能力養成，期讓學生在國內外設計競賽舞台上展現光芒，在產學合作中習得實務經驗並獲致產業界肯定。因此本課程旨在以實際演練達成兼具創新性與商品化專業設計能力養成。
description.en: Advanced Integrated Design educates students to identify and resolve design problems - innovatively and with sensitivity to the social, physical and ecological environment. Students learn to analyze and solve diverse design problems from technical, aesthetic, social and ecological viewpoints. Students are given the resources to identify, expand and test personal and professional development through an intensive exploration of design ideas. Innovation is stressed, along with the ability to refine formal design issues. There are numerous opportunities for students to work with industry through corporate-sponsored studio projects and design competitions.

name.zh: 進階整合設計研究與實務專題(四)
name.en: Advanced integrated design research and practice project(IV)

description.zh: 本課程主要是開設給已經修過"粉末冶金學"的學生，對粉末冶金製程與粉末冶金技術的應用有更進一步的認識。課程的安排在製程方面，強調粉末特性對粉末冶金製程的影響，成形模具的設計，燒結理論與現象，燒結体的後處理等。應用方面以本國現有的粉末冶金工廠與其製品為主，例如：機械零件、超硬工具材料、磁性材料、電接點材料、摩擦材料等製程的講述。
description.en: This course is a special topics of  Topic of powder metallurgy.

description.zh: 介紹晶體的各種完美結構，缺陷結構的形成與各種物理特性的相互關係，電子的波動與粒子之性質，電子於自由電子能量井，固態中行為與能帶觀念之介紹，固態材料的鬆散行為，固態的介電性質。
description.en: An introduction to Solid-State Physics in materials science.

description.zh: 1.合金製程簡介2.成份改變製程　a.合金熔煉-感應電爐、真空感應電爐  b.合金精煉-電弧爐、  c.電渣重熔精煉、真空電弧精煉、電子束精煉、電漿精煉3.合金結構改變製程　a.凝固控製與快速凝固　　b.方向性凝固　　　　　c.熱處理控制-均質化、強化處理　　d.鍛造、晶粒控制　　　　　　　4.合金形狀改重製程鍛造、軋壓、擠形、粉末冶金5.未來合金製程之發展及電腦之應用
description.en: This course is a special topics of  Processes of Structural Alloys.

description.zh: 本課程所為研究所課程，內容包括主動煞車控制系統介紹，將針對ABS, TCS, ESP 及 SBC 煞車系統原理介紹，煞車系統及控制器之數學模式及設計等，應用實例介紹。
description.en: This course is designed mainly for senior/graduate students. The objective of this course is to introduce active braking control system, such as ABS, TCS, ESP and SBC background. The mathematical model of the system and its applications for the controller design of braking system are also included.

notes: 車輛所、能源所、機電博、機械自動化、能源車輛外生班

description.zh: 本課程介紹有限元素分析法基本原理及其在各種工程問題上之應用。包含有限元素分析法之基本觀念，利用變分原理建立有限元素模式，形狀函數及等參數元素，一維問題：桿、桁架、樑及骨架等，二維問題：平面應力應變及板殼問題。三維問題：一般實體，有限元素分析之計算機程式處理，有限元素分析於動態問題之應用，相關有限元素分析套裝軟體簡介
description.en: Introduction to the finite element method and its application to engineering problems.  Topics include Variational Formulation and Finite Element Formulations, 1-D, 2-D and 3-D Element Shapes, Numerical Integration, Applications to dynamic problem and Introduction to Commercial Finite Element Programs.

notes: 日職車輛所、能源所、機電博、能源車輛外生班合開

description.zh: 本課程介紹有限元素分析法基本原理及其在各種工程問題上之應用。包含有限元素分析法之基本觀念，利用變分原理建立有限元素模式，形狀函數及等參數元素，一維問題：桿、桁架、樑及骨架等，二維問題：平面應力應變及板殼問題。三維問題：一般實體，有限元素分析之計算機程式處理，有限元素分析於動態問題之應用，相關有限元素分析套裝軟體簡介
description.en: Introduction to the finite element method and its application to engineering problems.  Topics include Variational Formulation and Finite Element Formulations, 1-D, 2-D and 3-D Element Shapes, Numerical Integration, Applications to dynamic problem and Introduction to Commercial Finite Element Programs.

notes: 日職車輛所、能源所、機電博和能源車輛外生班合開

description.zh: 21世紀的工業設計師已不能再靜待市場研究及產品企劃人員提供產品設計規範，而應以使用者代言人、及企業產品開發整合者身分，主動參與產品策略與企劃，並以視覺化技術協助相關人員作橫向溝通。因此，「產品創新設計策略與企劃」課程主要目標在教導學生以「前瞻性的視野」，透過創新設計的步驟與方法，策劃出符合企業技術及經營體質，並且能滿足市場及使用者使用情況需求的產品。本課程將以理論、方法、案例研討及個案研究方式進行。

Product Innovation Strategy will guide the enterprise looking beyond their current operation to match their technologies and the distinct competencies with emerging the user and the market needs.The contents of this topic will include theory, methodology, and practical case study.

notes: 工設三四與日職碩合開；一教1F

Students learn to analyze and solve diverse design problems from technical, aesthetic, social and ecological viewpoints. Students are given the resources to identify, expand and test personal and professional development through an intensive exploration of design ideas. Innovation is stressed, along with the ability to refine formal design issues. There are numerous opportunities for students to work with industry through corporate-sponsored studio projects and design competitions.

name.zh: 進階整合設計研究與實務專題(四)
name.en: Advanced integrated design research and practice project(IV)

description.zh: 1. 體認永續在設計之重要性 2. 熟悉永續之理論、知識、方法與應用 3. 解析綠色設計、生態環保、節能減碳 4. 綜合永續設計與工業設計實務
description.en: This course will assist in laying a basic foundation of knowledge for using 'sustainable design' assessment tools and rating schemes to inform the design process. The course will also enable students to engage in self-directed studies such as research and continuing development of professional careers.

description.zh: 本課程之目的係透過對文化之研究與解析，作為產品設計發展之元素，藉由設計專題之應用，開發出具文化意涵之商品，以培養學生對各種文化之解析能力，與設計之創新技能。
description.en: The aim of this course is via the research and analyze the culture, which to be the element of the development of product design. Through the application of design project to develop the cultural product. It could train the students the ability of analyzing the every cultures and the innovation skill of design.

description.zh: 本課程探討以人為本的設計思考與以系統化為基礎的計算思維，如何用以問題解決、系統設計與人類行為理解，包括同理心觀察的人類學方法、創意發展的比喻與類比思考方法、邏輯思維方法、巨大複雜系統設計與評估的工程思維方法，以及複雜性、智能、心理、人類行為的理解的科學思維方法。
description.en: This course is to explore some special topics about the approaches of human-centered design thinking and system-based computational thinking to problem solving, systematic design, and understanding human behavior, including the methods of empathy observation, metaphor and analogy, logic, complex systems, artificial intelligence, and psychology.

name.zh: 設計思考與計算思維專題
name.en: Special topics in design thinking and computational thinking

notes: 日職合開；設計603；職碩上限15人；MOST

description.zh: 本課程係將個別半導體製造程序視為獨立單元，運用化工單元操作的概念，併同現有半導體產業與未來發展趨勢的分析介紹，再輔以積體電路元件的設計原理，期使具化工背景人員能從製程、設備、元件原理等各方面取得一對半導體製程的整合性觀念。課程內容：(1)產業概覽(2)積體電路基本技術背景(3)積體電路設計(4)積體電路製造(5)內連線RC延遲電路與放大電路(6)金屬化製程技術(7)平坦化製程技術(8)物理氣相沉積與化學氣相沉積技術(9)線層/阻障層/種晶層(10)金屬填充/金屬互連(0.5~0.18um)(11)銅製程整合(0.13um含以上)(12)基極/位元線路/電容器(13)積體電路製程相關設備
description.en: In this class, the specified semiconductor process is considered as specified unit. By use of the concepts which belong to the chemical engineering unit operations to interpret the analysis / introduction in semiconductor industry and future developing trending. (Also including the theories of VLSI devices) The students who have studied professional chemical engineering courses for many years, can acquire completed and integrated viewpoints in semiconductor process. (Including processes; apparatuses and theories of devices)1. Industry overview2. IC Fundamentals3. IC Design4. IC Fabrication5. Interconnect RC Delay  vs Scaling6. Metallization technology 7. Planarization technology8. PVD and CVD Technology 9. Liner/Barrier/Seed (0.5-0.18um)10. Metal Fill/ Metal Interconnect (0.5-0.18um)11. Cu Integration (0.13um and beyond)12. Gate/Bit Line/Capacitor13. IC Equipments

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

notes: 網路預選限20人,化工所、生化所和EOMP合開

description.zh: 本課程通過理論介紹虛擬實境（Virtual Reality, VR）的概念與應用範圍，接續將3D環境建構的方法導入實踐操作，再透過專題設定進行內容創作，最終完成研究驗證的工作。課程目的是訓練學生在VR空間展示與設計研究端的流程，諸如3D環境設計、VR空間與內容建構、VR內容輸出與展示等能力。最終，學生可基於這些能力應用於各種虛擬空間的展示設計。
description.en: In this course, I will introduce the concept and scope of application of Virtual Reality (VR) via the theory, and then introduce the method of 3D environment construction into practical operation. Furthermore, this course will be showed how to creates content through a thematic setting, and finally completes the work of research and verification. The purpose of the course is to train students in the process of VR space display and design research, such as 3D environment design, VR space and content construction, VR content output, and display capabilities. Finally, students can apply these abilities to the display design of various virtual spaces.

name.zh: 虛擬空間展示與設計研究
name.en: Virtual Space Display and Design Research

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

notes: 博士班;合併化工碩士班專討上課

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

name.zh: 專題討論-生化與生醫工程組

notes: 博士班;合併生化碩士班專討上課

description.zh: 為應因八十七年之放流水標準,廢水處理必將進入高級處理之階段.在本課程中將深入探討混凝與膠凝,沈凝,氨氣提,過慮,吸附,薄膜處理,離子交換等各單元,並說明如何應用於廢水處理.
description.en: This topic is going to introduce Coagulation and Flocfulation,Sedimentation,Ammonia Removal,Filtration,Adsorption,and on exchange,and let learner know to use each unit on the wastewater treatment.

description.zh: 本課程主要在於介紹產品環保化設計的概念與實務做法，將會詳細介紹生命週期評估的內涵與原理做法，並將透過軟體的實際作來學期如何從事產品的生命週期評估。簡化式的生命週期評估之作法也會在課堂中被介紹。
description.en: This course focuses on introducing the meaning and principles of designing environmentally sound products. The theories and principles of Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) will be introduced extensively. Several sets of LCA computer software will be utilized in the classes for students to practice. Besides, the streamlined LCA (SLCA) will also be taught in the class.

description.zh: 能源在日常生活中以很多型態呈現，大量的能源使用於汽車動力、食物與用水加熱、產品製造、發電及其他不同事務。使用傳統能源會排放空氣污染物，因而引起鄰近地區、區域、跨國境空氣污染問題，甚至是全球的環境衝擊效應。本課程將檢視能源使用現況及其衍生的環境議題，並且探討能源使用之趨勢。傳統能源(如煤、石油、天然氣、核能等)、及再生能源(如太陽能、水力、風能、地熱能等)及能源效率等內容，都將於課程中介紹
description.en: Energy enters our everyday lives in many ways. Prodigious amounts of energy are used to power automobiles, heat food and water, manufacture products, generate electricity, and perform various other tasks. The use of traditional energy will emit air pollutants that may result in regional air pollution problem as well as global effects. In this course we will look at the current energy situation, its environmental implications, and try to determine the patterns of energy use. We will look at energy use as coal, petroleum, natural gas, nuclear energy, and renewable energy, such as solar energy, hydroelectric

description.zh: 本課程著重於環境污染物之微量監測與分析內容，此包括有機有毒物、重金屬之儀器分析原理、化學理論及分析方法。修習本課程宜有化學基礎。
description.en: The course introduces monitoring and analysis for environment pollutants. It focuses the micro quantity analysis based on chemical theory. Modern instruments with high sensitivity will be also discussed.

name.en: Monitoring and Analysis for Environmental Pollutants

description.zh: 能源在日常生活中以很多型態呈現，大量的能源使用於汽車動力、食物與用水加熱、產品製造、發電及其他不同事務。使用傳統能源會排放空氣污染物，因而引起鄰近地區、區域、跨國境空氣污染問題，甚至是全球的環境衝擊效應。本課程將檢視能源使用現況及其衍生的環境議題，並且探討能源使用之趨勢。傳統能源(如煤、石油、天然氣、核能等)、及再生能源(如太陽能、水力、風能、地熱能等)及能源效率等內容，都將於課程中介紹
description.en: Energy enters our everyday lives in many ways. Prodigious amounts of energy are used to power automobiles, heat food and water, manufacture products, generate electricity, and perform various other tasks. The use of traditional energy will emit air pollutants that may result in regional air pollution problem as well as global effects. In this course we will look at the current energy situation, its environmental implications, and try to determine the patterns of energy use. We will look at energy use as coal, petroleum, natural gas, nuclear energy, and renewable energy, such as solar energy, hydroelectric

description.zh: 以都會區空氣品質為範圍，配合污染源類別﹙粒狀物，SOx， NOx， VOC， THC及O3﹚，本課程從逸散性、固定污染性、移動污染性等不同方向，以講述空品之規劃與管理等問題。此包括PSI指標與空品特性分析，及減目標與管制策略之研訂等。
description.en: The course gives a brief introduction to planning and management for air quality. The main contents are focused on fugitive pollution, stationary, and movable sources. Index of pollution standard will be also discussed in the course.

name.en: Planning and Management for Air Quality

description.zh: 程式語言為計算機軟體之基礎，本課程主要探討程式語言之類型以及各種語言之設計原理與特色，經由對這些原理及特色之了解，程式設計師便可針對各類應用之特性選擇最合適之語言。本課程內容包括：1.程式語言之發展與分類，2.設計原理，3.語法與語意，4.資料型態，5.控制結構，6.正規語言，7.抽象資料型態，8.物件導向程式語言，9.函式語言，10.邏輯語言，11.平行處理語言。
description.en: 1.History and paradigm of programming languages 2.Design principles of programming languages 3.Syntex and semantics 4.Data types 5.Control structures 6. Formal languages 7.Abstract data types 8. Object-oriented programming languages 9.Functional programming languages 9.Logic programming languages 10.Parallel processing languages

description.zh: 本課程是研究所程度的計算機圖學，介紹三維計算機繪圖原理、OpenGL、著色語言、繪圖管線、計算幾何、射線追蹤、體積成像繪圖，課程範圍包含計算機圖學最新的研究主題如物理模擬、射線投射、巨觀且聚焦技術、即時體積成像繪圖等等。
description.en: This course is a graduate-level computer graphics class. Topics include 3D computer graphics, OpenGL, shading language, graphics pipeline, computational geometry, ray tracing, and volume rendering. The course material cover topics of the state-of-the-art research problems, such as the physical simulation, ray casting, focus and context techniques for volume data for real-time rendering.

description.zh: 學習敏捷與精實軟體開發方法與敏捷實務作法。本課程將涵蓋下列主題：一、Scrum方法二、終極編程方法三、看板方法四、終極編程核心與配套實務作法五、精實軟體開發實務做法
description.en: Students will learn Agile and Lean software development methods and agile practices. This course will cover the following topics:一、Scrum method二、XP method三、Kanban method四、XP primary and corollary practices五、Lean software development practices

description.zh: 認識科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

notes: 陳文輝老師/王柏雅老師合開

description.zh: 1.物件導向程式設計特性介紹 2.視窗圖形界面設計 3. SQL語言的使用與資料庫連結 4.智慧型演算法 5.工程實例應用
description.en: 1.An introduction to object-oriented design 2.Windows GUI design 3.SQL and Database connection programming 4.Intelligent Algorithms 5. Applications of engineering problems

name.zh: 物件導向程式設計與應用

description.zh: 介紹VBA 語言基本資料處理的概念，包含基本輸入與輸出、程式的流程控制、函數的應用等指令之撰寫、程式之編輯、編譯、聯絡與程式之執行，並發展一套應用程式。
description.en: This course introduces the basic data processes of EXCEL VBA language. They include input/output, program process control, application of functions, program editing and execution, and so on.

description.zh: 本課程著重在奈米材料的合成以及鑑定，包含氣相反應以及溶液相反應。課程核心內容為：(1)各式溶液相合成奈米粉末、中空奈米球以及奈米線(2)氣相反應合成奈米管、奈米線(3)分子轉印技術(4)奈米材料檢測技術
description.en: This course will cover the syntheses and characterization of various nanomaterials. The core lectures include:1. syntheses of nanoparticles, hollow nanospheres and nanowires from solutions2. syntheses of nanowires and nanotubes from the gas phase3. molecular imprinting4. characterization and properties of nanomaterials

description.zh: 對無機化合物之結構，化學性質等，利用量子化學，群論及結晶化學等加以探討。以配合天然礦物之形成，產狀，地球化學及環境化學等學科之授課內容。
description.en: The chemical structure and properties of inorganic compounds, which are useful for the following courses: the forming and occurrence of minerals, earth and environmental chemistry, will be discussed by using quantum chemistry, group theory and crystallography.

description.zh: 一、應力及應變分析。 二、線彈性破壞理論。 三、黏彈性破壞理論。 四、岩石動態行為。 五、岩石材料性質。六、岩體特性。七、大地應力應變現地量測。八、岩石模型。九、岩石爆破與開挖。十、地下工程設計及施工。十一、監測系統。
description.en: 一、Stress and strain analysis二、Linear elastical failure theory三、Visco-elastic failure theory四、Dynamics behavior of rocks五、Rock properties六、Rock behavior七、In-situ stress and strain measurement八、Rock model九、Rock blasting and excavation十、Underground engineering operation十一、Monitoring system

description.zh: 本課程從礦物的化學成分、化學鍵及其晶體結構之理論詳細討論礦物的物理及化學性質。再就各項理化性質在選礦、冶煉、化工製造及其它物理加工等方面之應用分別舉例介紹。
description.en: Systematic Study of physical and chemical properties of minerals, and relationships of properties with chemical  compositions, chemical bonding mechanisms and crystal  structures.  Application examples are introduced in the  fields of mineral processing, metal extraction, chemical  industry, etc..

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程希望協助學生瞭解如何以標準積體電路系統設計流程來設計超大型積體電路系統，旨在採用多種數位與類比電腦輔助設計軟體來訓練學生，使其能熟悉並使用超大型積體電路系統的設計軟體，培育學生具備超大型積體電路系統設計實務與經驗。本課程的主要內容包括：1.超大型積體電路簡介；2.晶片製程介紹；3.MOSFET元件；4. MOSFET走線；5.Hspice軟體介紹 ；6. Hspice電路模擬；7.類比電路佈局與實作；8.Verilog HDL(硬體描述語言)；9.電路合成 ；10.自動測試圖樣產生；11.時脈靜態分析；12.電路佈局與佈線；13.DRC與LVS檢測；14.寄生參數萃取與佈局後模擬；15.設計功能驗證16. 設計方案報告
description.en: Students will learn how to design VLSI circuits and systems based on a standard VLSI system design flow, where various electronic design automation (EDA) tools will be used extensively in the semester. Those EDA tools includes analog and digital circuits and systems. The main purpose of this course includes the following:1.	VLSI Introduction.2.	Manufacturing Process.3.	MOSFET Devices.4.	MOSFET Wires.5.	Hspice Software.6.	Hspice Simulation.7.	Analog IC Layout and Practice.8.	Verilog-HDL.9.	Synthesis.10.	Design for Testability and Automatic Test Pattern Generation.11.	Static Timing Analysis.12.	Placement and Routing.13.	Design Rule Check, Layout Versus Schematic.14.	Layout Parasitic Extraction and Simulation.15.	Design Verification.16.	Project Presentation.

name.zh: 電腦輔助積體電路系統設計實務
name.en: Computer-Aided VLSI System Design and Practice

description.zh: 深度學習數位影像分析，在近代的製造、醫藥、農業、太空探索、運輸和通信系統等應用領域，正迅速發展中。本課程主要介紹深度學習數位影像分析基本理論基礎，以此概念實際應用到各領域中。課程將探索最先進的深度學習模型，如物件偵測、影像分類，和影像分割，提供實用的實務練習；最後討論數位影像分析深度學習的未來挑戰。課程也將介紹最新的公開影像數據集(例如MNIST，CIFAR-10和ImageNet)，並涵蓋用於深度學習中的影像數據前處理和樣本標籤註記，詳細探討深度學習模型的評估指標。本課程將使用Matlab和Python範例，實作教學練習，課程單元包含:●數位影像分析簡介●深度學習基礎●影像分析領域之深度學習基本介紹●卷積神經網絡●訓練卷積神經網絡●遷移式學習●深度學習數位影像數據標籤註記●深度學習模型評估方式●深度學習在數位影像分析領域之挑戰●超引數優化●激活函式●損失函式●優化函式
description.en: The field of digital image analysis is growing rapidly in many application areas such as manufacturing, medicine, agriculture, transportation, and communication systems. This course aims to introduce the foundations of deep learning for digital image analysis from the fundamental theoretical concepts to applications. The class will provide students with an opportunity to explore the state-of-the-art deep learning models for object detection, image classification, and image segmentation with practical hands-on experience. The challenges of deep learning in the field of digital image analysis will be discussed in this class. The course will also explore some popular image datasets such as MNIST, CIFAR-10, and ImageNet, covering the image data preparation and labeling for deep learning. Evaluation metrics for deep learning models will be examined in detail. Students are free to use any programming language, however the programming examples in this course will be given in Matlab and Python

name.zh: 深度學習數位影像分析
name.en: Deep Learning for Digital Image Analysis

description.zh: 課程主要內容介紹自動化科技之基礎知識與先進應用技術，並側重在自動化科技相關之專業知識。
description.en: This course introduces the fundamental theories and advanced technologies in the field of automatic and advanced technologies. The topics covered mainly in the areas of automation technologies, and related research areas.

notes: 自動化所和機電博合開

description.zh: 本課程藉由實地場域踏場及在地對話，導入設計思考與實踐能量，學習如何協助地方擴展並升級形象。課程中可藉由形象設計等手法了解如何提升城市文化的在地體驗，深化地方共同體的歸屬感。修課學生可實際體驗形象塑造之程序及手法，包含參與線上線下設計工作坊、試打樣與製作之程序，可串接未來展示與社造等設計研究相關活動。
description.en: This course introduces design thinking and practical energy through field visits and in-situ dialogues and learns how to help expand and upgrade the image of a place. In this course, I will teach image design and other design methods to understand how to enhance urban culture's in-place experience and deepen the local community's sense of belonging. Students can experience image-building procedures and techniques, including participating in online and offline design workshops, trial proofing and production procedures, and connecting with future exhibition and social design research-related activities.

description.zh: 本課程藉由實地場域踏場及在地對話，導入設計思考與實踐能量，學習如何協助地方擴展並升級形象。課程中可藉由形象設計等手法了解如何提升城市文化的在地體驗，深化地方共同體的歸屬感。修課學生可實際體驗形象塑造之程序及手法，包含參與線上線下設計工作坊、試打樣與製作之程序，可串接未來展示與社造等設計研究相關活動。
description.en: This course introduces design thinking and practical energy through field visits and in-situ dialogues and learns how to help expand and upgrade the image of a place. In this course, I will teach image design and other design methods to understand how to enhance urban culture's in-place experience and deepen the local community's sense of belonging. Students can experience image-building procedures and techniques, including participating in online and offline design workshops, trial proofing and production procedures, and connecting with future exhibition and social design research-related activities.

notes: 日職合開；職碩上限7人；USR；設計207

description.zh: 本課程在使學生認識嵌入式系統，瞭解其系統架構，並學習嵌入式系統之硬體與軟體之設計技術。內容包含：(1)嵌入式系統介紹 (2)嵌入式系統應用 (3)嵌入式系統硬體 (4)嵌入式系統軟體架構 (5)中斷處理 (6)記憶體管理 (7)週邊應用 (8) 即時作業系統。
description.en: This course let students to understand the embedded system and learn the skill to design the hardware and software of embedded system.  The contents of this course are: (1)Embedded System Introduction, (2)Embedded System Application, (3)Embedded System Hardware, (4)Embedded System Software Architectures, (5)Interrupts, (6)Memory (7) Peripherals, (8)Real-Time Operating System.

name.zh: 嵌入式系統設計與應用

description.zh: 本課程以論文研討方式學習 "機器學習" 理論之基本概念與應用及各種演算法。課程內容包含概念式學習、決策樹、圖型理論、神經網路、貝氏網路、案例式學習及支持向量機等方法。經由這門課，學生能對現代機器學習技術及其應用有基本的了解。
description.en: This is a graduate seminar-based course that provides an overview of many algorithms in machine learning and its applications. In this course, we will take an interdisciplinary look at current research topics in machine learning covering Concept Learning, Decision Tree, Graphical Model, Neural Network, Bayesian Network, Instance-based Learning, and Support Vector Machine. Through the course, students can have the basic ideas and intuition behind modern machine learning methods.

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生瞭解各類化工程序模式的建立以及其求解的方法。內容包括：輸送動態方程式之建立，線性、非線性、矩陣、微分方程等之轉換及求解。
description.en: The goal of process simulation is to develop numerical analysis techniques that allow students to simulate the behavior of a chemical process. The contents involving：the development of dynamic equations of transport, the transformations and solutions of linear, nonlinear matrix, and differential equations.

notes: 全英授課；電腦教室；Ardila Hayu Tiwikrama

description.zh: 本課程旨在對非工程類科出身之研究生，做有系統基礎材料科學之建立。課程包括(1)原子鍵結與配位(2)晶體[原子規律性](3)固相中之不規律性(4)相平衡(5)材料微結構(6)反應速率(7)材料破壞學(8)導電材與半導材料(9)陶瓷材料(10)聚合物及複合材料
description.en: This course is aimed at systematically introducing some important concepts of material engineering for students who were not an engineer training in their BS. The course covers (1)Atomic Bonding and Coordination (2)Crystal Structure (3)Disorder in Solid Phase (4)Phase Equilibria (5)Microstructures (6)Reaction Rate (7)Deformation and Fracture (8)Conducting and Semi-conducting Materials (9)Ceramic Materials (10)Polymer and Composites.

description.zh: 介紹新興生醫產業的趨勢與其跨領域之特性。課程內容含: 生醫產業簡介, 新世紀人類基因體大計畫, 微生物工程新應用, 新型蛋白質藥劑之開發, 分子醫療診斷之革新, 生醫產業之電腦新科技, 遠距醫療服務新模式, 創新健康管理與保險制度的創新, 生醫產業與科技法律, 生醫產業與社會倫理, 幹細胞新產業, 組織再生新產業, 超級老鼠的誕生, 美美的生醫美容, 抗癌症研究之新科技, 抗傳染疾病之新科技。評分的方式以學生報告為主。
description.en: The course is designed to teach graduate students about the recent advances in glycobiology with medical and biotechnological applications. The prerequisite for the course is general biochemistry. Students are expected to learn the structure, biosynthesis, chemistry and cell biology in related to bioactive glycans.

name.zh: 新世紀生醫產業創新科技
name.en: Innovative biomedical industries in the new millennium

description.zh: 本課程介紹電子顯微鏡之結構，成像及繞射原理，以及在材料科學方面之應用，課程內容包括穿透式電子顯微鏡之構造，電磁透鏡與成像原理，電子繞射原理，繞射圖型分析，試片之製作方法。掃描式電子顯微鏡之構造及成像原理。EDS及WDS之X光光譜測量。
description.en: The course introduces the structure of a electron microscope, the theories of image forming and diffraction, the applications of materials science.  The course contents include structure of the transmission electron microscope, the electromagnetic lens and theory of image formation, theory of electronic diffraction, analysis of diffraction pattern, and the preparation of test sample.  The structure and principle of forming image for a scanning electron microscope, the X-ray spectrography of EDS and WDS are also included in this course.

notes: 限30人機電所和製科所合開，製科所必選課程之一

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。生物力學是一門整合醫學與工學的學科。本課程介紹並討論十大主題：(1)脊椎生物力學、(2)關節生物力學、(3)骨折生物力學、(4)復健生物力學、(5)運動生物力學、(6)心血管生物力學、(7)植入物設計原理、(8)手術器械設計原理、(9)矯具設計原理與(10)病床與輪椅設計原理。
description.en: Biomechanics is a multi-discipline branch incorporating medicine and mechanics. Ten topics are introduced and discussed in this class: (1) spinal biomechanics, (2) joint biomechanics, (3) trauma biomechanics, (4) rehabilitation biomechanics, (5) sport biomechanics, (6) cardiovascular biomechanics, (7) implant design, (8) instrument design, (9) orthotice design, and (10) sickbed and wheelchair design.

name.zh: 植入物與矯具生物力學

notes: 限21人/機電所和製科所合開

description.zh: 定性之隨機系統、定性及隨機系統參數估計、定性及隨機系統之適應預測、線性定性及隨機系統之適應控制。
description.en: Deterministic and Stochastic system, Parameter Estimation of Deterministic and Stochastic systems, Adaptive Estimation of Deterministic and Stochastic systems, Adaptive Controls of Linear Deterministic and Stochastic Systems.

notes: 限50人/機電所、製科所、機電博、車輛外生合開

description.zh: 本課程教授商品化實務概念並由學生實際操作，如何以一貫作業完成市場銷售商品。由消費者洞察開始，教導學生如何從消費者行為找到需求，進而思考產品設計動機。設計過程中涵蓋專利，製造與營運思維，最後以實際商品設計呈現。
description.en: The purpose of this course is study the concept of commercialization and how to sale the products to marketing through the consistent process.It’ll ask student to find the consumer's requirements from observation, then think and confirm the design purpose. The design process will include patent, manufacture, operating thinking, and commodity design.

notes: 工設四與日職碩合開；合開總上限15人；USR

description.zh: 本課程教授商品化實務概念並由學生實際操作，如何以一貫作業完成市場銷售商品。由消費者洞察開始，教導學生如何從消費者行為找到需求，進而思考產品設計動機。設計過程中涵蓋專利，製造與營運思維，最後以實際商品設計呈現。
description.en: The purpose of this course is study the concept of commercialization and how to sale the products to marketing through the consistent process.It’ll ask student to find the consumer's requirements from observation, then think and confirm the design purpose. The design process will include patent, manufacture, operating thinking, and commodity design.

notes: 工設四與日職碩合開；合開總上限15人；USR；設計603

description.zh: 1.數位影像處理的基礎2.影像的轉換3.影像的加強4.影像的復原5.彩色影像的處理6.影像的壓縮7.影像的分割與特徵抽取8.影像的表達及描述9.影像的辨認與解釋10.導航與醫學影像
description.en: 1.Digital image fundamentals.2.Image transforms.3.Image enhancement.4.Image restoration.5.Color image processing.6.Image compression.7.Image segmentation and feature detection.8.Representation and desciption.9.Recogmition and interpretation.10.Applications:ALV navigaton and medical image.

notes: 電子所與電資外生所合開；綜科104

description.zh: 1.MOS元件工作模式及MOSFET原理 2.微小MOSFET的額外考慮 3.矽晶圓的生長 4.擴 散 5.離子植入 6.氧化處理 7.CVD技術 8.微影術 9.蒸鍍與濺鍍 10.光罩製作 11.CMOS IC製程
description.en: 1. Operating modes and theory of MOS devices. 2. Small-geometry effects. 3. Wafer growth. 4. Diffusion. 5. Ion implantation. 6. Oxidation. 7. CVD techniques. 8. Lithography. 9. Sputtering and evaporation. 10. Photo masking. 11. CMOS IC fabrication processing.

description.zh: 本課程主要目標在研習以VLSI的觀點來設計近代數位訊號處理架構，使學生得以將數位訊號處理的架構以超大型積體電路IC方式來實現之。其課程內容包含如下：1、超大型積體電路介紹2、各式數位訊號架構介紹3、各式加減乘除法器架構4、DCT、FIR、MPEG等架構5、近代高效率數位訊號等架構6、專題研究
description.en: This course is an introduction to the design and implementation of various types of VLSI DSP structures and such that the students have the ability of DSP IC design in this course. The major topics covered in this course are:1、Introduction to modern VLSI system2、Introduction to digital signal processing system3、Architectures of adder、subtracter、multiplier、divider etc.4、Architectures of DCT、FIR and MPEG etc.5、Modern high-performance DSP architecture6、Special project

description.zh: 本課程主要係介紹資料壓縮的原理以及當前幾項重要的壓縮標準。本課程內容將涵蓋以下主題01. 霍夫曼編碼02. 算數編碼03. 純量量化與向量量化04. 線性預測與預測編碼法（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. 轉換編碼（KLT，DFT，DCT，DST以及Walsh-Hadamard轉換）06. 分頻編碼法（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. 小波編碼法（SPIHT，JPEG2000）08. 字典模式編碼法09. 跑長編碼法10. 主題探討
description.en: This course is mainly focused on the principles of data compression techniques as well as the state-of-the-art compression standards. The course content includes01. Huffman codes02. Arithmetic codes03. Scalar quantization and Vector quantization04. Linear prediction and Predictive coding（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. Transform coding（KLT, DFT, DCT, DST, and WHT）06. Subband coding（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. Wavelet-Based Compression（SPIHT, JPEG2000）08. Dictionary techniques09. Runlength coding10. Selected topics

description.zh: 生物工程和醫療技術的研究和發展，在最近幾十年中，促成明確的臨床醫學和衛生保健的進步。這些領域的發展，開啟了生物工程、臨床技術和醫學信息領域課程的蓬勃發展；目前，各大學及研究所多有提供這些領域的課程。然而，大多數參與者多來自工程背景，因此學習生物科學和醫學應用於工程思維及模式，方能使得工程師和醫生之間的科學能無礙地交流。這項課程主要是為了使主修工程及材料的學生提供具有實用性的人體結構和組織的原則及相互依存的細胞和組織器官的生理系統進行有用的學習。雖然課程可能無法全然覆蓋所有生物醫學工程領域的基礎，但在這個學習過程中，我們將專注於大多數生物醫學工程以及生技和組織工程從事的主要研發領域作出努力。這門課程是醫學和工程及材料之間的橋樑。這將是促進各類工程及設計師和醫事人員之間文化和科學的交通和相互研習課程，促進生物醫學工程的創新發現和發展。在這個過程中，我們將提供一系列的生物學和醫學知識和方法，應用在工程、材料和電子領域，旨在幫助他們能將其整和連接，可以開始從工程進入生物醫學工程的專業，或者提供工程師期許能“簡單”理解特定臨床醫療科學和技術。經由醫學背景引導進入此領域，將結合工程及材料師長的經
description.en: Research and development in bioengineering and medical technology, conducted during recent decades, have led to spectacular progress in clinical medicine and healthcare. These achievements have triggered an enormous increase in the number courses offered in the areas of bioengineering, clinical technology and medical informatics; nowadays, most major universities offer curricula oriented towards these fields. The majority of participants however come from engineering background and so modules dealing with basic biological and medical sciences have been included, to the detriments of scientific exchanges between engineers and medical doctors. This study is primarily to give those majoring in the electronic and engineering students a useful glimpse of the principles of human structure and organization and of the interdependence of cellular and organ physiological systems. Although it is no possible to cover all of the biomedical engineering domains in this course, we will have made an e

notes: 電子三四甲乙與電子所合開

description.zh: 1.微波傳輸線2.微波元件3.微波材料4.微波量測5.微波傳輸轉換6.微波耦合7.微波濾波器8.微波天線
description.en: 1.Microware Transmission Lines2.Microware Elements3.Microware Matericals4.Microware Measurements5.Microware Transitions6.Microware Couplers7.Microware Filters8.Microware Antennas

description.zh: 1.無線通訊系統簡介2.蜂巢式行動通訊系統概念介紹3.無線電通訊的傳播原理4.行動通訊之調變技術5.行動通訊之多工技術6.天線﹑多元性與系統分析7.行動通訊之數位與語音編碼8.無線網路系統9.行動通訊之現有規格與未來發展
description.en: 1.Introduction to wireless communication systems2.An Overview of cellular systems3.Mobile Radis Propagation(path loss,multipath     fasing,propagation models)4.Modulation techniques for mobile communications5.Multiple access techniques for mobile communications6.Antenna,dirersity and link analysis7.Channel coding and speech coding8.Wireless networking9.Wireless systems standards and further developments

notes: 電子所與電資外生所合開，日職合開

description.zh: 本課程主要目標在設計一個嵌入式系統時，如何同時考慮選擇與設計系統軟體及硬體之方法，課程內容如下：1.介紹軟硬體共同設計之基本概念2.嵌入式系統之系統設計3.系統設計步驟4.系統功能最佳化5.系統功能及結構最佳化6.結構之最佳化7.軟硬體之共同合成及評估8.系統功能及結構最佳化及共同設計之流程9.合成之結果
description.en: The goal of this course is how to design and select the hardware andsoftware parts for designing an embedded system. The contents of this courseare shown as follows :1.Introduction to Hardware-Software Co-design2.Ststem Level Design of Embedded Systems3.Design Representation4.Function Optimizations5.Function/ Architecture Optimizations6.Architectural Optimizations7.Hardware/software Co-synthesis and Estimation8.Function/Architecture Optimization and Co-design Flow9.Synthesis Results

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養設計與實作軟體定義無線網路的能力。軟體定義網路由控制平面、資料平面與網路功能虛擬化等技術所構成，透過資料平面/控制平面設計，以軟體定義封包傳輸方式。本課程著重於這些軟體定義網路的技術於無線網路的設計，包含應用軟體定義網路在物聯網及 5G 通訊系統。本課程以實習方式利用 OpenFlow 實作控制器及交換器，使學生透過資料平面與控制平面技術的開發，瞭解軟體定義網路對於無線網路的影響。
description.en: This course covers theoretical foundations and applications in the design of software-defined networking (SDN) for wireless network. The outline of this course is given as follows: 1. Introduction of OpenFlow; 2. Data Plane; 3. Control Plane; 4. Network Function Virtualization (NFV); 5. SDN for Internet of Things (IoT); 6. SDN of 5G System.

notes: 電子大四甲乙與電子所合開；綜科501

description.zh: 課程主要為介紹學術界最新的深度學習研究成果，教導學員使用Python深度學習套件，讓學員能將深度學習技術應用於各個不同的領域。課程內容包括：?車牌與門牌數字辨識?人臉辨識?1000種影像分類?辨識9000種物件  ?自動駕駛模擬?嵌入式深度學習演算法?空虛, 寂寞, 覺得冷? 讓深度學習來幫助你:?遞迴式神經網路(RNN)：找不到人聊天？訓練自己的聊天機器人?對抗生成網路(GAN)：用GAN產生自己的夢中情人?深度強化學習(DRL)：訓練AI跟你一起玩遊戲
description.en: The goal of this course is to introduce latest deep learning researches and allow students to develop deep learning applications using Python library (TensorFlow & Keras). The content includes:?Number recognition of License plate and Doorplate?Face Recognition?1000 Image Classification?9000 Object Detection?Autopilot simulation?Embedded Deep Learning Algorithms?Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN)?Recurrent Neural Networks (RNN)?Long-Short Term Memory (LSTM)?Generative Adversarial Networks (GAN)?Deep Reinforcement Learning

name.zh: 深度學習應用開發實務

notes: 電子所與電資外生所合開

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來設計類比濾波器,進而能培養學生具有設計類比濾波器的能力,課程內容包念： 1.簡介 2.低雜訊放大器 3.混波器 4.振盪器5.頻率合成器 6.功率放大器 7. 類比基頻訊號處理
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the design of analog filter. Therefore, the student has the design capability of analog filter integrated circuit. The contents of this course: 1. Introduction 2.LNA 3.Mixer 4.Oscillators 5.Frequency Synthesizers 6.Power Amplifier 7.Analog Baseband Signal Processing

description.zh: 1.微波傳輸線2.微波元件3.微波材料4.微波量測5.微波傳輸轉換6.微波耦合7.微波濾波器8.微波天線

description.zh: 本課程主要係介紹資料壓縮的原理以及當前幾項重要的壓縮標準。本課程內容將涵蓋以下主題01. 霍夫曼編碼02. 算數編碼03. 純量量化與向量量化04. 線性預測與預測編碼法（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. 轉換編碼（KLT，DFT，DCT，DST以及Walsh-Hadamard轉換）06. 分頻編碼法（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. 小波編碼法（SPIHT，JPEG2000）08. 字典模式編碼法09. 跑長編碼法10. 主題探討
