Arithmetic codes03. Scalar quantization and Vector quantization04. Linear prediction and Predictive coding（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. Transform coding（KLT, DFT, DCT, DST, and WHT）06. Subband coding（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. Wavelet-Based Compression（SPIHT, JPEG2000）08. Dictionary techniques09. Runlength coding10. Selected topics

description.zh: (1)資料庫系統簡介，(2)關聯式與實體關係資料模型，(3)資料表正規化，(4)結構化查詢語言，(5)交易管理與並時控制(6)分散式資料庫管理系統(7)物件導向式資料庫(8)電子商務中之資料庫(9)資料庫管理(10)網路式資料庫專題－規劃與實作。
description.en: (1)Introduction to database systems,(2)Relational and E-R database models,(3)Normalization of database tables,(4)SQL (Structure Query Language),(5)Transaction management and concurrence control,(6)Distributed database management systems,(7)Object oriented databases,(8)Databases in electronic commerce,(9)Database Administration,(10)Web-based database project-design and implementation.

description.zh: 中文概述：本課程主要目標在介紹射頻積體電路設計之基本原理，使學生具有射頻積體電路設計之能力。其課程內容包含如下：1、被動IC元件的特性               10、低雜訊放大器之設計2、MOS元件介紹                   11、混波器3、被動RLC網路                   12、射頻功率放大器  4、分散式系統                    13、回授系統       5、史密斯圖形及S參數             14、鎖相迴路      6、頻寬評估技術                  15、振盪器與合成器   7、射頻放大器之設計              16、結構8、電壓參考及偏壓                  9、雜訊分析
description.en: This course is introduced the principle of Radio Frequency IC Design such that the students have the ability of Radio Frequency IC design. The contents of this course are1、CHARACTERISITICS OF PASSIVE IC COMPONENTS2、A REVIEW OF MOS DEVICE PHYSICS3、PASSIVE RLC NETWORKS4、DISTRIBUTED SYSTEMS5、THE SMITH CHART AND S-PARAMETERS6、BANDWIDTH ESTIMATION TECHNIQUES7、HIGH-FREQUENCY AMPLIFIER DESIG8、VOLTAGE REFERENCES AND BIASING9、NOISE ANALYSIS10、LNA DESIGN11、MIXERS12、RF POWER AMPLIFIERS13、FEEDBACK SYSTEMS14、PHASE-LOCKED LOOPS15、OSCILLATORS AND SYNTHESIZERS16、ARCHITECTURES

description.zh: 本課程教授系統分析之模擬方法應用於能源動力系統之穩態與動態分析(malab)。內容包括能源系統個元件之特性分析與數學模型介紹，系統元件包括；壓縮機、渦輪機、熱交換器、與質子交換膜燃料電池系統。授課單元如下；1.數值方法介紹2.能源系統元件數學模型與程式撰寫壓縮機   渦輪機   熱交換器3.能源系統分析範例；燃料電池系統分析流道model、氣體擴散層model、燃料電池質傳與電化學傳輸與程式範例
description.en: The course is a system analysis method for performing steady-state and dynamic system simulations of lumped component system (matlab). These methods are essentially a numerical analysis; the course teach student to set up various system composed of; compressor, turbine, heat exchanger, reformer and fuel cell system. Course lectures are listed as:1.Numerical method 2.System components modeling Compressor   Turbine   Heat exchanger3.Case study of energy system; fuel cell system analysisFlow modeling, GDL model, mass & charge transport and programing

description.zh: 以結構工程、大地工程、防災科學、運輸交通、營建管理、營建材料及營建技術為專題討論主題之主要範疇。
description.en: SeminarSpecial subject discussion of structure engineering , geography engineering pretecting calamity science, transportation, construction management , construction material and construction technique.

description.zh: 平行運算指的是將需要耗費大量電腦CPU時間的複雜工程模擬問題平行化，分散到不同處理器上同時同步執行，以求能在合理的時間內獲致結果，並應用在工程設計或理論建構上。在本課程中將介紹平行運算的原理（Concurrency and Synchronization），分辨可平行化和不可平行化的問題，探討平行運算的演算法和可計算性，以及介紹將程式平行化的實用技術，並分析程式容錯性和可靠度（Fault Tolerance and Reliability），以幫助學生將平行運算應用在土木工程和學術研究中，學生將有機會使用平行化程式語言（High Performance Fortran）開發應用程式，本課程先修課程為程式設計，建議研究所同學選修。
description.en: Parallel computing is a methodology to handle complex engineering problems by distributing the intensive computation work to different processors to process simultaneously in order to obtain the results in a reasonable amount of time. This course will introduce the basic theory of parallel computing, teach how to identify problems that are parallelizable, and demonstrate how to apply the principles of parallel computing to civil engineering problems. Students will have opportunities to obtain hands-on experience by developing their own parallel programs (using High Performance Fortran). The prerequisite of this course is computer programming. It is suitable for graduate students to choose as an elective.

description.zh: 人工智慧導論與應用，依序介紹機器學習、深度學習等人工智慧發展範疇與技術演進，並就問題思考精神、人類腦神經運作方式與數學達成之手段與技巧 ，作完整展開之介紹與討論 ，並依技術應用之發展、需求導引之趨勢、AI能力之未來發展方向與應用展望，加以說明與討論。
description.en: Introduce machine learning, deep learning and other artificial intelligence development categories and technological evolution in order, and give a complete introduction and discussion on the spirit of thinking about problems, the operation method of human brain and the methods and techniques of mathematical achievement.   Following the progress of technology and application, the trend of driven demand, the future development direction on AI ability and the prospective application will be explained and discussed in depth.

name.en: Introduction and Application of Artificial Intelligence

description.zh: 建立學生對各類資料探勘技術與理論的基礎觀念及架構，以奠定學生日後從事資料探勘分析與研究工作時之需。相關的分析技術將包括應用在分類(classification)、推估(estimation)、預測(prediction)、關聯式分組(affinity grouping)、同質分組(clustering)等功能中的決策樹、(decision tree)多變量分析(multivariate analysis)及類神經網路(neural network)等方法。此外為了讓學生對相關技術有更深的瞭解，課程中將以個案實例為主，並配合各種資料探勘套裝軟體，以應用的觀點使學生更容易接受了解在商業智慧分析上資料探勘分析的功用。
description.en: Several fundamental theories of data mining techniques are included in this course. For examples, decision tree, multivariate analysis and neural network. All these techniques will be applied in different areas, such as classification, association rule, forecasting, and pattern recognition. And various applications in different enterprises are also included.

description.zh: 數位時代的快速變遷使得許多高階管理者們對於企業應該如何轉型感到不確定。了解科技、商業模式、消費者行為等趨勢，才能使企業從數位環境中發現機會，定位未來企業的發展方向並尋求合適的方法進行變革，成功進行數位化轉型，將挑戰轉化為商機。本課程將針對企業數位轉型中相關議題如環境發展，數位策略，數位經營模式，製造業與服務業等各產業數位案例，及企業數位化成熟度等作研析。
description.en: The rapid changes in the digital age have made many high-level managers uncertain about how companies should transform. Understanding trends in technology, business models, consumer behavior, etc., enables companies to identify opportunities in the digital environment, position the future direction of the enterprise and seek appropriate ways to transform, successfully transform digitally, and turn challenges into business opportunities.This course will focus on the related issues such as environmental development, digital strategy, digital business model, manufacturing and service industries, and the digital maturity of enterprises.

name.zh: 企業數位轉型專題研究
name.en: Research on Digital Transformation of Enterprises

description.zh: 本課程旨在增進電機工程研究所學生對行動電話通訊網路工程實務之了解與分析設計之實作能力，期望學生之所學能與產業科技發展的脈動同步。 內容主要包括： (一) 電信基本概要簡介 (二) 行動電話通訊系統之演進與發展 (三) 蜂巢式行動電話基本網路架構與功能 (四) 臺灣GSM網路運作實例研討 (五) 無線網路之規劃設計與工程實務 (1)信號涵蓋之電腦模擬與路測技術 (2)通話流量與系統容量分析 (3)頻率規劃與干擾研究 (六) 系統優化與網路維運管理實務 (七) 電信公司營運機房與網管中心實地參觀 (八) 射頻規劃之電腦軟體模擬實驗: 在系裡經費許可之前提下提供學生實習網路規劃。
description.en: This course aims to improve EE graduate student's knowledge in mobile telecommunication networks with emphasis on the engineering practice, as well as to train the students to be able to design and analyze the mobile telecommunication networks. The course content includes the following: (1) Fundamentals of Telecommunications (2) Mobile telecom systems evolution and future trend (3) Cellular network structure and functions (4) Taiwan GSM networks case study (5) Wireless networks planning, design and engineering practice 1. RF planning: computer simulation and road test 2. Traffic and capacity analysis 3. Frequency planning and interference study (6) System optimization and network management (7) Site-visiting to Telecomm company's operation center (8) Planning/design simulation using computer software if funding is allowed.

name.zh: 行動通訊網路原理與實務
name.en: Mobile Telecommunication Networks Principles and Practice

description.zh: 人工智慧導論與應用，依序介紹機器學習、深度學習等人工智慧發展範疇與技術演進，並就問題思考精神、人類腦神經運作方式與數學達成之手段與技巧 ，作完整展開之介紹與討論 ，並依技術應用之發展、需求導引之趨勢、AI能力之未來發展方向與應用展望，加以說明與討論。
description.en: Introduce machine learning, deep learning and other artificial intelligence development categories and technological evolution in order, and give a complete introduction and discussion on the spirit of thinking about problems, the operation method of human brain and the methods and techniques of mathematical achievement.   Following the progress of technology and application, the trend of driven demand, the future development direction on AI ability and the prospective application will be explained and discussed in depth.

name.en: Introduction and Application of Artificial Intelligence

description.zh: 現代能源工程技術，決定製程成本，故如何統合有效率的能源管理技術是決定產品競爭力之關鍵，本課程主要內容為︰1. 能源成本控制2. 區域型電力能管理策略3. 能源系統的經濟性設計概念4. 冷暖系統的檢測與分析5. 總合能源操作的工程化資料收集6. 新能源系統的生態模組化設計
description.en: At the completion of this course, students will be able to several factors:1. Compare and contrast the various forms of energy conversion.2. Examine the technologies used to convert chemical energy into mechanical energy.3. Apply the concepts of electrical converters.4. Evaluate the major types of energy storage.5. Determine how human values affect the success of energy conservation.6. Design of new energy system modules with ecology considerations.

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程主要在讓學生藉由規劃與實施一項公益活動，以實踐企業倫理與社會責任，並藉以思考在推展企業倫理、企業社會責任與公司治理等理念時，如何能落實於企業的體制之中，以建立一個永續發展的企業價值體系。
description.en: This course is designed to enable students to implement corporate ethics and social responsibility by planning and implementing a public welfare activity. The students should think about how to implement corporate ethics, corporate social responsibility, and corporate governance concepts. In order to establish a sustainable enterprise value system.

name.zh: 企業倫理與社會責任實踐
name.en: Corporate Ethics and Social Responsibility Practice

description.zh: 本課程主要在讓學生藉由規劃與實施一項公益活動，以實踐企業倫理與社會責任，並藉以思考在推展企業倫理、企業社會責任與公司治理等理念時，如何能落實於企業的體制之中，以建立一個永續發展的企業價值體系。
description.en: This course is designed to enable students to implement corporate ethics and social responsibility by planning and implementing a public welfare activity. The students should think about how to implement corporate ethics, corporate social responsibility, and corporate governance concepts. In order to establish a sustainable enterprise value system.

name.zh: 企業倫理與社會責任實踐
name.en: Corporate Ethics and Social Responsibility Practice

description.zh: 本課程將介紹軟性計算的概念、特性與優點，旨在提供學生多種不同的技術解決相關問題。課程目標有二：(1) 相關軟性計算技術，包含：關聯分析、群聚分析、分類等；(2)相關軟性計算技術應用，包含：時間序列分析、M-V Model、商業資料分析與組合管理等。
description.en: In this course, concepts, properties advantages of soft computing are introduced for providing various ways for students to solve problems. The goals of this course include two parts: (1) related soft computing techniques, including association analysis, clustering, classification, etc; (2) related soft computing applications, including time series analysis, mean-variance model, business data analysis and portfolio management, etc.

description.zh: 本課程銜接上學期程式交易課程內容(限定修過上學期的同學才能選修)，我們將使用R語言進行更為精實的交易策略建構，包刮K棒分析、指標建構、訊號探勘、資金管理…等。此外，我們下半學期將邀請業師教授XQ程式交易軟體，撰寫XS程式語法進行回測以及模擬下單
description.en: This course connects with the last semester courses “program trading” (limited to last semester students to join). We will use the R language for more sophisticated trading strategy construction, including K-bar analysis, index construction, trading signal exploration, money management, and so on. In addition, we will invite the instructor to teach XQ program trading software in the last half-semester, usingXS program grammar to back-testing trading strategies.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Paper Presentation of special topics on education, giving lectures, and group meeting.

description.zh: 認識心理與教育測驗的起源、發展、運用與測驗實施及倫理議題，同時探討常模與標準化、信度、效度、測驗研發編製(含項目分析)的理論基礎。
description.en: To realize origin, development, application, test implementation and ethical issues of psychological and educational test and explore theories of norms, standardization, reliability, validity and test development (including item analysis)

description.zh: 校務研究（Institutional Research，以下簡稱IR）可說是針對校務所進行的各項研究，透過資料蒐集、分析、報告，以及教職員行動，以促進高等教育機構的運作與決定。同時IR的發展和大學評鑑的發展脈絡息息相關，最終的目的就是要提升學校辦學品質，促進學校良善發展。本課程主要希望加強同學對IR的了解及發展實作能力。
description.en: Institutional research is a broad category of work done at schools, colleges and universities to inform campus decision-making and planning in areas such as admissions, financial aid, curriculum, enrollment management, staffing, student life, finance, facilities, athletics, and alumni relations. Its mission is to foster a culture of evidence by facilitating the management, analysis, and reporting of institutional data and information in support of planning and decision-making. This curriculum is expected to provide all students understand the theory and practice of IR.

notes: 碩博課程 全英文授課

description.zh: 本課程旨在協助學生探究教育社會學的理論與實務，探討主題包含:社會化、社會階層、教育機會均等、技職教育與社會發展等，並期學生運用相關論點對當前技職教育問題提出建議。
description.en: This course is designed to assist students understanding the theory and practice of the sociology of education and applying sociological views to solve the problems. Topics include socialization and education, social change transition and education, equity of educational opportunity, collaboration between social development and technical-vocational education, etc.

description.zh: 為了使訓練資源的更有效運用，本課程希望讓學生了解，企業內部在實施訓練之前，應客觀、嚴謹的加以評估，並追蹤其實施後的成效，以正確評估訓練的效益。
description.en: To make better use of the training resources, the curriculum expects to make students understand that any enterprise should objectively and carefully evaluate the training program before its employment, and keep track of its effect after its employment to make sure the effectiveness of the training program.

name.zh: 教育訓練實施與績效評鑑

notes: 碩博課程 日夜合開

description.zh: 本課程在探討學校行政理論的歷史背景、學校社會系統理論、學校科層體制、學校氣氛、學校領導、決策、溝通理論、學校效能等，並以技職學校作為討論主軸。
description.en: This course is to guide students to explore the historical background of the theories of school administration; theories of school social system; school departmental hierarchy; school atmosphere; school leadership; theories of decision and communication; studies of school efficiency. Students are expected to apply related theory to analyze VTE issues after the class.

name.en: Administration of Vocational and Technological School

description.zh: 組織行為是採用分析的方法，了解研究解個體行為在個人、團體、組織三個層次中的行為表現，並應用相關學理知識提高組織效能，尤其將焦點放在如何提高員工的生產力、降低離職率與曠職率，增加滿意度等四個變項上。
description.en: Organizational behavior (OB) is a field of research that investigates the impact that individuals, groups, and structure have on behavior within an organization, and then it applies that knowledge to make organizations work more effectively.  Specifically, OB focuses on how to improve productivity, reduce absenteeism and turnover, and increase employee citizenship and job satisfaction.

description.zh: 探討遊戲式數位學習之相關原理、設計、以及實務應用。內容包括遊戲式數位學習之優點、特性、限制、科技、媒體、設計與發展、系統、實際案例、未來趨勢等。
description.en: The course aims to explore advanced issues on game-based e-learning including its characteristics, advantages and limitations, technology and media involved, design and development, system and practical cases, and future trends, etc.

name.zh: 遊戲式數位學習專題研究

description.zh: 課程內容包括：技職教育的理論基礎、能力本位、建教合作、生計教育、職業輔導、技職課程與教學等理念與實務。
description.en: Course content include: theoretical foundations and developmental trends of technical and vocational education, competence-based instruction, cooperative education, career education, vocational guidance, technical and vocational education curriculum.

name.en: Theory and practice of Technical-Vocational Education

description.zh: 為了使訓練資源的更有效運用，本課程希望讓學生了解，企業內部在實施訓練之前，應客觀、嚴謹的加以評估，並追蹤其實施後的成效，以正確評估訓練的效益。
description.en: To make better use of the training resources, the curriculum expects to make students understand that any enterprise should objectively and carefully evaluate the training program before its employment, and keep track of its effect after its employment to make sure the effectiveness of the training program.

name.zh: 教育訓練實施與績效評鑑

description.zh: 使用者導向之設計已成為大多數互動設計的依循主軸。他翻轉了以產品為導向的傳統，強調以使用者的偏好引領設計的價值。而這就是設計思考的方法導入互動設計中，利用其敏感性和方法，透過可行及可用的技術滿足使用者的需求，從而產生使用者價值並發展市場機會。研究建議，由世界級的設計公司IDEO所主導，設計思考與決策科學相結合，觸發了同理心設計與工程技術的融合。這不僅可以確保提出兼容實際性和創造性地問題解決方案外，而且在設計的開始便融入使用者導向的設計概念，將有助於創新設計與解決方案的提出。同時，在設計的初始階段導入資料應用與分析的方法，更能在設計中正確的整合敏感性，技術可行性，商轉可行性和使用者的需求。本課程主要的概念在於利用設計思考以使用者導向之設計方法，將使用者及其需求作為設計提案以及解決方案的啟始點，並整合分析設計對象，使用者所遭遇的問題，以及如何提高性能以及實現可擴展性等問題。並透過資料科學與工具的整合應用，導引資料分析人員與設計專業人員進行跨領域的整合，以建構未來設計創新的機會與願景。因此，本課程的主要目標是：1.建構以用戶為導向之人本設計重要設計流程。2.使用高品質的數據，可以創建設計工件，
description.en: As the user-center design is becoming the core of most interaction design (IxD), it has become a popular belief that it is no longer the product that leads but users and user preferences that's leading the game. This is where design thinking steps in, where IxD uses their sensibility and methods to match users' need in a way that is technologically feasible and viable enough to generate user value and tap market opportunity. Suggested by some studies, brought in vogue by the popular design firm IDEO, design thinking when combined with decision science results in an infusion of empathy with engineering. This not only ensures a practical and creative resolution of problems but also puts the user at the center of applications and at the starting point to develop new designs and solutions. Meanwhile, ensuring design in analytics projects from the initial stages can lead to the right blend of sensibility, technical feasibility, business viability, and consumer needs.The idea is, design th

description.zh: 本課程介紹整合即時影像、即時音訊、實體裝置、及相關表演科技（如燈光控制、各類感應器應用等）之技術與應用實務，並藉由圖形化、物件導向程式設計系統，引導未有程式設計經驗的視覺設計者或輔助已有程式設計能力者，以更有效率的方式進行相關互動系統設計，藉以達成互動裝置、表演科技、與表演藝術之整合。
description.en: This course introduces the technology that help integrates real-time video, audio, installations, and associated performance arts technology (such as lighting control, the application of various types of sensors, etc.) into performing arts. Through a graphical, object-oriented programming system, the course is intended to help visual designers with no programming experiences or to assist experienced programmers to efficiently design the interactive systems that combine interactive installations, performance arts technology, and performing arts itself as a whole.

name.en: Interactive Installation and Performing Arts Technology

notes: 日職合開,排進修部教室

description.zh: 互動設計可視為三大傳統設計領域：平面設計、工業設計，與建築設計的延伸。在許許多多延伸出來的新設計領域如 UI、UX、響應式網頁、互動產品、智慧空間等等，圖像依舊是所有設計在發想、討論，與實現設計上所仰賴的根本工具。本課程以圖像為設計語言的架構下，介紹由圖像所發展出來的數位生產線，以模組技術介紹互動設計在設計發想、原型製作，以至到設計討論與提案所需要之圖像技術，並鼓勵學生以一設計提案來總結課堂之所學。
description.en: Interaction design can be considered as an extension of the long-established fields of architectural, industrial, and graphical design. Regardless what types of the recent emerging field of interaction design such as UI, UX, responsive website, tangible interaction design, or smart environment, the image remains as the visual language for design ideation to realization. This course introduces the concept of digital pipeline which is mediated on wide range of image related digital technologies. Through those modularized technologies, we can form a working pipeline to create a prototype for an interaction design proposal.

notes: 排光華409,建議碩一選修,外碩,日碩,職碩,設計博班合開

description.zh: 認識坡地災害，包括全球性的原因與台灣地區特有的自然因素、人為因素及坡地災害現，進而討論坡地災害防治的原則及方法。1.坡地災害防治的重要性 2.坡地災害的全球性原因 3.台灣的削平速率與山坡地崩坍概況 4.台灣地區最脆弱的坡地 5.台灣地區坡地災害的自然動力 6.坡地災害的人為因素 7.坡地破壞之前兆 8.坡地災害防治一般性原則 9.坡地災害防治所必需的基本資料 10.坡地災害的防治與復育技術 11.坡地災害的緊急救治方法 12坡地災害個案分析
description.en: Slope calamity prevention  To understand slope -suffering, include global factors and specific nature factors, man-made factors and current slope-suffering in Taiwan to discuss the slope calamity prevention's method and principles. 1.the importance of slope calamity prevention2.the global factors of slope calamity prevention3.the cut velocity and slope slide overview4.the frailest slope in Taiwan5.the nature factor in Taiwan slope calamity 6.the man-made factor in slope calamity7.the omen of slope damage8.the general principles in slope calamity prevention9.essential basic information of slope calamity prevention10.slope calamity prevention and repair skill11.the emergency treatment in slope calamity prevention 12.slope calamity case analyses

description.zh: 此課程係提供對不織布學之研究與理論有興趣的研究生。課程包括所有不織布製造方法與其在工業領域上之應用，包括有短纖維網、長絲網、濕式纖維網之製造方法；纖維網之物理強化方法，纖維網之化學強化方法；不織布、薄膜、梭織物與針織物之疊層方法；微細與超微細粒子在不織布上之應用；不織布之印染與整理加工；不織布在電子、航太、醫學材料及人工皮革上之應用。
description.en: This program is designed for graduate students who are interested in research and theoretical aspects of Non-woven materials. The course covers all aspects of Non-woven manufacturing methods, as well as their applications in industry. They include manufacturing methods of; fibrous web filament web wet method; physically bonded, chemically bonded or methods; lamination among the film, woven, knitted and Non-woven fabrics; use of fine and superfine particle in Non-woven industry; Printing and Finishing for Non-woven; use of Non-woven in electronics aerospace, medical materials and artificial leather..…etc.

description.zh: 本課程探討作業研究方法在營建工程之應用，課程內容包括作業方研究方法，施工作業研究，工期控制之作業研究，資源調配之作業研究，工期與成本控制之作業研究，施工材料之最佳管理，其他施工作業問題之研究。
description.en: operation's studyConstruction engineer and the study of operations. The study of the operation's method , construction , working phase, distribution the resources, working phase and cost control the best manage of construction making and other studies of working matters.

description.zh: 本課程將以BIM之觀點，介紹國內外建築資訊模型及建築資訊模型案例，包含建築資訊模型及探討BIM之設計與實作，希望學生能夠由設計一個資訊系統開始，瞭解BIM建築資訊系統之架構與應用，進而實際開發一個BIM相關資訊系統，其內容包括：建築資訊模型營建自動化應用，建築資訊模型實務應用，國內外建築資訊模型案例探討，建築資訊模型元件分析與設計，BIM程式撰寫，BIM系統之設計與實作等內容。
description.en: Building Information Modeling (BIM) is increasingly important for engineering and management applications, functions and decision-making. The course introduces the BIM use, modeling, design, and development of BIM-related application in the lifecycle of construction projects. The course is a combination of lectures, readings, hands-on exercises, homework assignments and a project. The course allows students to develop a BIM-related application suitable to their own research or professional inteests.

name.zh: 建築資訊模型理論與應用
name.en: Building Information Modeling: Theory and Applications

description.zh: 妥善地利用資源可促使資源生生不息，不當地濫用卻會帶來大地反撲，禍及人類，如何在建設的同時,大興土木之際，顧及生態體系，及為本課程之主要重點。課程內容包括環境生態系統、生態學之基本法則、質能傳遞、污染物對生態之影響。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to learn how to use the natural sources for industrial development but alse maintain the ecological balance. Improper usage of natural resourses will bring adverse results. The topic will include:fundamental ecology, mass and energy transfer and the impact of industrial development on ecology.

description.zh: 電控技術在現代工業應用中扮演著不可或缺的角色。因此，本課程的目的在使學生了解電控技術，其內容包括Matlab/Simulink軟體平台介紹、電控系統建模、分析與設計。
description.en: Electrical control technology plays an important role in modern industrial applications. Therefore, the purpose of this course is to introduce the technology to the students. The content includes Matlab/Simulink software platform, and electrical control system modeling, analysis and design.

name.zh: 計算機在電控技術之應用
name.en: Computer Methods for Electrical Control Technology

description.zh: 本課程針對固體廢棄物的來源及基本性質，分析並介紹各種固體廢棄物再生的技術與方法實例。
description.en: This class include the discussion of the origin of the solid waste and its basic physical and chemical properties that related to its recovery, recycling and reutilization.  The recovery methods and the follow-up process to recycle the solid waste will also be discussed.  Several practical case study will be included.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹1.變分法        2.線性彈性力學       3.變分法應用到彈性力學4.Euler梁與Timoshenko梁      5.扭力    6.古典板理論7.彈性穩定.
description.en: This course will introduces:1.Calculus of Variations2.Linear Elasticity3.Variational Principles of Elasticity4.Euler Beam and Timoshenko Beam5.Torsion6.Classical Theory of Plates7.Elastic Stability

description.zh: 應用統計學之目的乃教導學生機率與統計的理論，其強調利用統計方法及資料分析之技巧，以解決工程上可能面臨的問題，因此本課程將大量引用真實資料及實例，以說明如何處理相關的問題。本課程的包含的內容將涵蓋資料分析、機率、隨機變數、機率分佈、推估、假設檢定、取樣、線性迴歸、機率過程、變異數分析及多變量分析。
description.en: This is a comprehensive course in probability and statistics for students in engineering and technology discipline.  It emphasizes modern statistical methods and data analysis using real data and examples to offer students exposure to practical applications.  This course will provide an opportunity to learn how probabilistic analysis and statistical reasoning and testing can be applied to a wide range of problems in civil engineering.  Topics to be covered will include data analysis, probability, random variables, probability distributions, estimation, hypothesis testing, sampling, linear regression, statistical process control and analysis of variance.

description.zh: 本課程將探討明渠中穩定流、非穩定流、均勻流、非均勻流之流體特性。
description.en: Open channel hydraulics treats the motion of water in conduits that have a free surface, that is, in which the flow of water is not completely bounded by the channel perimeter and one surface is exposed to atmospheric pressure.  The flows can be steady (time-invariant) or unsteady, uniform (space-invariant) or non-uniform (gradually, rapidly, or spatially varied).  For engineers, open channels are very common for the conveyance of natural waters, storm discharges, sewage collection systems, and aqueducts for water distribution systems. Knowledge of the mechanics of open-channel flow, then, is important for the proper design of these facilities.

description.zh: 電化學工程特論的領域眾多，舉凡腐蝕現象與電泳作用的探討，電分析感測器或電池元件的製作，以及電鍍、拋光或鋁和氯氣的生產技術等均為電化學工程的範疇。本課程除了介紹基本的電化學原理外，另將著重於電化學分析方法在能源與生醫系統研究上的應用。
description.en: Special topics in the field of electrochemistry include many different phenomena (e.g., corrosion and electrophoresis, electro analytical sensors and batteries devices, and the electroplating of metals and the large-scale production of aluminum and chlorine technologies……). In addition to an overview of the basic principles of electrochemistry, the main emphasis here is on the application of electro-analytical methods to the study of energy and biomedical systems.

description.zh: 課程主要為介紹人工智慧概念和基本原理，學習DNN/CNN/LSTM的神經網路架構和學習方法，並舉資通訊技術應用實例說明，進而在雲端或非雲端平台實作人工智慧。課程內容包括：1.人工智慧概念和基本原理2.DNN與深度學習3.DNN應用實例:5G無線資源分配4.CNN5.LSTM 6.LSTM應用實例: 5G極化碼解碼和Federated Learning7.Attention神經網路8.CNN和Attention應用實例:影片場景分段9.學習方法:監督式，非監督式，強化學習10.Amazon雲端平台11.Amazon DeepLens智慧鏡頭平台12.Amazon Alexsa智慧音箱平台13.分組實作
description.en: The goal of this course is to introduce ideas and principles behind artificial intelligence. We will teach the structure of DNN/CNN/LSTM neural network structure and learning methods, and implement artificial intelligence in cloud or non-cloud platforms. The course content includes:1.Ideas and principles of artificial intelligence2.DNN and deep learning3.DNN example: 5G wireless resource allocation4.CNN5.RNN/LSTM6.LSTM example: 5G Polar code decoder and Federated Learning7.Attention neural network8.CNN and attention example: video scene boundary detection9.Learning methods: supervised, unsupervised, reinforcement10.Amazon cloud platform11.Amazon DeepLens12.Amazon Alexsa13.Project implementation

name.zh: 人工智慧在資通訊技術應用實務
name.en: Artificial Intelligence in Information and Communication Technology Applications

description.zh: 污染源分析，室內空氣品質標準，濃度平衡之計算法，空氣之過濾原理與設計，建築通風法規，生物潔淨室標準，化學過濾應用，ASHRAE 62標準之探討
description.en: Pollution source analysis, indoor air quality standards, balance of concentration, air filtration theories and designs, building ventilation standards, bio-clean room standards, chemical filtration, discussion on ASHRAE standard 62.

notes: 能源所和車輛外生班合開

description.zh: 自動化應用基礎，自動化規劃設計︰1. 個體冷凍設備2. 冷凍系統運轉操作3. 冷凍倉儲管理自動化4. 低溫冷凍應用自動化
description.en: Fundamentals and design of automation applications include:1. Unitary refrigeration equipment.2. Refrigerating system operation.3. Refrigerated warehousing management.4. Low temperature refrigeration application.

description.zh: 實驗是進行科學與工程研究不可或缺的工具，實驗方法的設計與實驗數據的分析更是決定實驗結果品質優劣的關鍵，本課程將介紹實驗過程所必須具備的各項知識，以數據的量測與分析為開始，並介紹量測各類物理量的感測元件，如壓力、溫度、流量及聲波等，以建立學生具備實驗量測的基礎。課程主要內容包含有基本量測、量測標準、量測單位、訊號讀取、資料簡報、數據的準確性與變異性、類比訊號量測、數位訊號量測、系統響應、感測器。
description.en: Introduction of Experiment and Measurement MethodExperiment is the essential tool for the research of science and engineering. The design of experiment and the analysis of data are the keys of the high quality of experiment. The course will introduce the materials of experiment and measurement. The procedures of measurement and the analysis method of data will be detailed investigated. And then the sensors to measure the interested physical parameters of pressure, temperature, flow rate and acoustic will be introduced. The technology of measurement and analysis of experiment will be built up in the course. The contents of the course are basic measurement, standards of measurement, dimension of measurement, access data, data presentation, accuracy and uncertainty of data, analog signal measurement, digital signal measurement, system response, and sensors.

description.zh: 熱交換器設計方法、單向對流熱傳計算、壓差計算、冷凝器與蒸發器分析、殼管式熱交換器分析、密集式熱交換器分析、濕盤管理論分析
description.en: Design methods, forced convection correlations for single phase heat exchange, pressure calculation, condensers and evaporators analysis, shell and tube heat exchanger analysis, compact heat exchanger analysis, wet coil analysis.

description.zh: 本課程介紹如何應用數值分析理論求解工程問題。包含數值方法基本觀念，數值方法之誤差及穩定性，非線性代數方程式之數值解法，聯立代數方程式之數值解法，矩陣特徵值求法，非線性聯立方程式之數值解法，多項式插值法及曲線嵌合，數值微分與積分，常微分方程式及偏微分方程式之數值解法 。
description.en: Introduction of using numerical methods to solve practical engineering problems. Topics include Solving nonlinear equations, Solving sets of equations, interpolation and curve fitting, numerical differentiation and integration, numerical solution of ODE and PDE.

notes: 車輛所、機電博、能源車輛外生班合開

description.zh: 以圖像語言的架構教授分析性繪圖 (Analytical Drawing Process) 的概念與操作，以及分析性繪圖在設計速寫上的應用。課程以課堂講解與實地速寫來進行，主題包括感知與理解層面的三維觀察與紀錄、圖解、與圖像筆記。教學目標為：1.介紹分析性繪圖與徒手草寫。2.訓練以徒手草寫的過程來觀察、分析、與記錄結構、空間、與建成環境的三維特性。3.熟悉感知與理解的圖學系統與速寫表現手法，能以圖像筆記來記錄設計主題。
description.en: This course introduces the concept of analytical drawing process, and how to utilize it in design sketching.The objectives are:1.Introduce the concept of analytical drawing process and techniques of freehand sketch. 2.Develop the ability to see and analyze the three-dimensional characteristics of an observed object and encountered environment through analytical drawing process. 3.Familiar with both conceptual and perceptual form of representation, and be able to take a visual note to document an investigated subject.

notes: 排光華409,外碩,日碩,設計博合開(全英)

description.zh: 本課程之目的主要在於介紹數位遊戲發展理論以及數位遊戲創作美學理論，講解如何涵養遊戲美學與獲得數位遊戲媒材設計知識。上課內容包含數位遊戲發展、數位遊戲介面設計、數位遊戲表現模式、數位遊戲形式、以及數位遊戲趨勢以及實際設計小型Flash遊戲。教學方法包括：講解、討論、觀摩、以及示範操作。
description.en: This course is mainly an introduction to the theory of game media design and theory of digital game design aesthetics, showing students how to cultivate game aesthetics and acquire knowledge of digital game media design. Digital game development, digital game interface design, digital game presenting mode, digital game style, digital game trend, and small Flash game design will also be taught in class. This course will be carried out with lecture, discussion, emulation, and demonstration.

notes: 外生專班、互動所和設計博班合開,全英文授課

description.zh: 針對學生在建築設計及都市規劃基礎訓練之後，有異於前期以技術性思考，改以都市開發及宏觀政策及微觀個案財務之角度切入建築及都市開發之議題，以輔助學生建立都市開發與都市型態間關連性之整合概念。
description.en: After the technical approaches in urban planning and building design, the financial and political issues are to be taken into consideration in urban affairs. The micro- financial plan in developments and the macro- political issues in housing policy would be introduced to the urban planning practice.

name.en: The housing Development and urban Policy

description.zh: 本課程將介紹現今用各種結構系統〔耐震、免震（隔震）、制震（減震）〕的特性及耐震性能原理，由基礎力學理論配合應用實務設計做一統括整理解說。並從地震中建築物實際破壞狀況的解說到耐震診斷及耐震補強技術做一現況的解說與說明。
description.en: The earthquake-proof performance principle and the characteristic of the structural system (1.General structure 2.Base isolation structure 3.Virbration control,Damper) being used well now are introduced at this course, and lectures from the mechanics theory of the base to a aactual design. In addition, the destruction situation and the earthquake-proof diagnosis reinforcement in the building are explained due to the earquake.

name.en: The earthquake-proof performance principle and the character

description.zh: 本課程的目的是研究人與環境互動的關係，介紹環境心理學發展的過程及相關的理論。並藉由觀察與評估現有生活環境中的行為，增進我們對環境心理學中在理論與經驗上不同取向的瞭解。課程內容包括1.緒論2.研究方法及理論架構 3. 建成環境，由家環境到城市空間4.社會行為及實質環境5.自然環境與行為6.使用者用後評估7. 結論
description.en: The purpose of this course is to explore the interaction relationships between human and environment, introducing the development and theory of environmental psychology. Via observing and evaluating the behavior of present living environment, enhance our knowledge about environmental psychology through various approaches to theories and experiences. The course includes:1. Introduction  2. Research methods and theory framework 3. The built environment from home environment to city space 4. Social behavior and the physical environment 5. The natural environment and behavior 6. Post-occupancy evaluation 7. Conclusion

notes: 日職建都所與設計博合開

description.zh: 本課程以建築專業回應社會需求為依歸。針對台灣原住民部落之返鄉青年之居住與生產模式提出各項議題討論。藉由社區總體營造與民眾參與等方式，以一學期的進程發展新的部落建築形式與配置計畫，並在永續發展與保育並重的前提下，提出實質開發與營造施工的前期規劃。
description.en: This course introduces the theories, principles, and methods of designing and construction for local social issues in Taiwan. In this year, Focuses on the Settlements of aboriginal people, through cases studies and design practice, the courses seeks to expand the students understanding to the major components of site planning. The topics also focus on six premises:1.theories in relation to site planning;2.design sequences of site planning;3.investigations and analyses of the sites;4.planning and designing methods and their evaluations;5.environmental impact assessment and countermeasures.

notes: 建築三、四與職建都所合開

description.zh: 本課程將包含使用者經驗設計的基礎，以及使用者研究量測的內涵及方法。本課程中，將透過課堂上課、討論、以及實習的方式，介紹使用者研究的實際案例、評估模式、團隊合作方法、設計與評估工具、實踐思維、挑戰、以及實際執行的程序。預期學生將於本課程中，透過分組獲得使用者經驗在互動設計、空間設計以及產品設計上，有關使用者研究的設計、評估、施行、以及質化與量化分析量測評估的知識與方法。
description.en: This course will cover the fundamentals of user experience design and provide the students with insights into the measurement of user research. The real-life processes, challenges, considerations, tools, team works, models and case studies of user research are introduced in this course by lecturing, discussing and practicing methods. Students are expecting to learn user experience principles, to designing, evaluating, implementing and measuring user experience in both qualitative and quantitative methods in the aspect of interaction design, space design and product design individually.

name.zh: 使用者經驗設計與評量

notes: 排設計701,外生專班、互動所和設計博班合開

description.zh: 本課程主要是要讓學生對醫學設計之基本理論及實務內容有所認識。了解一個健康醫療產品/系統/服務從醫學及使用者需求的思維、如何發展到設計理念之形成、設計內容之導入實現、工程技術之開發、原型機製作、臨床前測試、臨床試驗、醫療認證、及工業管理等層次。讓學生能掌握跨領域之醫學設計原理，並教導如何藉由創新產品設計與開發方法引導醫學背景與設計背景之專業人士合作以瞭解開發市場上成功之健康醫療產品之關鍵課題、針對臨床服務需求，提出健康醫療創新解決方案。進而產生創新健康醫療產品。
description.en: This course aims to teach postgraduate students to understand the basic theory and practice of medical design. Learn about the health and medical products/ systems/ services from the discovery of medical and user needs to the design of innovative healthcare products, which include the topics of how to generate the design concepts, understand the user and market needs, develop the engineering technologies and prototype, design pre-clinical testing and clinical trials, obtain medical certification and plan industrial management. To enable students to master the principles of interdisciplinary medical design, and teach them how to use innovative product design and development approach to guide professionals in medical backgrounds and design backgrounds to understand the key issues in developing successful health medical products in the market and address the needs of clinical services, propose innovative solutions for health care, and develop innovative health and medical products.

notes: 創新所、互動外生專班與設計博合開

description.zh: 本課程將介紹國內外的房屋生產系統和裝修技術案例。該課程將在以下主題中進行。A.規劃審查施工生產的總體方向，包括施工合同，項目預算，生命週期，  風險管理和資金分配方法。B.設計物流和裝貨的程度，施工方法。 設計系統，建築設計智能，建築材  料和性能。 建築生產對社會的影響。C.施工現場調查，施工計劃，施工前時間表，施工管理，方法及其演變。D.裝修建築拆除或裝修的評估標準，裝修計劃，設計，項目，法令和系統。E.拆除：建築拆除的機械和方法，以及建築廢料的再利用。
description.en: This course will introduce the domestic and foreign housing production system and renovation technology cases.The course will be conducted in the following topics.A.	Planning A review of the overall direction of construction production, including construction contract, project budget,life cycle, risk management and method of fund dispatch.B.	Design The degree of logistics and loading, construction method. Design system, building design intelligence,building materials and performance. The influence of construction production to society.C.	Construction The site investigation, construction plan, time schedule before construction, construction management,methods and their evolutions.D.	Renovation The assessment criteria of building demolition or renovation, the renovation plan, design, project, decree and system.E.	Demolition：The building demolition machinery and methods, and the reuse of building waste materials.

description.zh: 施工歷史可以被視為了解建築理論的關鍵基礎。按照慣例，建築學院提供建築歷史方面的研究方面，包括建築風格和哲學的發展，或者建築材料和建築技術的最新進展。此外，關於建築的理論辯論也更加關注哲學的討論，而不是物理建築的表現。但是，建築理論主要討論材料和建築系統的表示。因此，材料的構造方法實際上會極大地影響建築理論的解釋。因此，該課程可以分為兩個部分：首先，將回顧東西方世界的建設歷史以及現代時期。其次，將討論結構論和相對論的爭論。本課程的目的是發展與會學生的能力，使他們能夠回顧自己論點的要點，並運用適當的理論來支持或爭論他們對建築理論的理解。
description.en: Construction history could be considered as the key foundation to understand architectonic theories. Conventionally, architectural academies provide study aspects either in architectural histories in terms of development of architectural style and philosophy or in the latest progress of architectural materials and construction techniques. Moreover, theoretical debates of architecture also pay more attentions to philosophical discussions instead of physical construction presentation.Nevertheless, architectonic theories mainly discuss the presentation of materials and construction systems. Therefore, construction methods of materials in fact affect the interpretation of architectonic theories significantly. As a result, this course can be divided into two sections: firstly the construction history of Eastern and Western worlds as well as modern period of time will be reviewed. Secondly the architectonic and relative theoretic debates will be discussed. The purpose of the course is to d

notes: 建築四、建都所與設計博合開

description.zh: 有關建築歷史、理論、批評、構造、營建管理等相關主題討論。
description.en: A theme topic discussion on the field of architecture history, theory, criticism, structure, construction and management, etc.

description.zh: 自20世紀中葉以來，建築論證的核心及與其他學門之間的關係開始出現清楚的變化，而這些變動是具有證據性地邁向與文化研究和哲學領域的連結。如此關係並非單向性發展，而是一種建立在互惠性過程中的擴張擾動。不僅是建築師和建築理論家越發接近文化理論的觀念，相當多數的文化研究學者、哲學家和社會學家正逐步涉入建築和建築環境的議題甚而提問。在承襲如此能動的知識轉換脈絡下，卻也呈現出建築師和建築專業學生在面對理解甚至運用此些思想家的論述上， 遇見相當程度的艱難挑戰，從而導致學門之間非預期的距離與迷霧。基於此，本課程將由兩項核心意圖所構成。首先，承襲跨學門能動脈絡，試圖將建築引入更廣泛的文化背景，並思考文化理論辯證如何對於建築討論提供擴充性的訊息。其次，提供建築在文化研究論述中的閱讀錨定點; 一方面有助解碼文化研究專詞，另一方面為閱讀關鍵思想家的論述提供一條較清晰的認知途徑。本課程將以幾位重要文化研究學者與哲學家為核心，透過其本身直接書寫建築，或其關鍵性影響當代建築師與建築評論家的重要著作為課程內容架構，進而以更活潑豐富的路徑反思何為建築之內涵。
description.en: Since the mid-twentieth century, there is evidence of a strong shift in the center of debates within architecture and in its relationship with other academic disciplines, in particular with cultural studies and philosophy. It, however, was a reciprocal process. Not only are architects and architectural theorists becoming more close to ideas of cultural theory, but in great numbers of cultural theorists, philosophers and sociologists are to be found highly engaged with questions of architecture and the built environment. Yet, in recent, it is found that architects and students of architecture may confront struggling to deeply navigate those thinkers’ work resulting in unexpected distances and hazes between disciplines. Therefore, there are two intentions to form this module. Firstly, it attempts to introduce architecture to a broader cultural context, and to consider how debates from cultural theory might begin to inform a discussion about architecture (Leach 1997). Secondly, it tries

name.zh: 批判性建築與文化研究

notes: 建築四與建都所合開，安排小教室，如PBL

description.zh: 針對大學所習之廣義生產管理再作深入的闡述，一方面做公開的個案分析研討，以收進一步的學習之效，同時要求學生做實務專題研究
description.en: Production and operation management,case study and analysis,and independent study.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。1.晶體結構與晶體缺陷 2.光電材料的種類 3.材料的光電特性 4.發光元件 5.檢光元件 6.各種光耦合器
description.en: 1.Crystal structures and defects 2.Optoelectronic aterials3.Optoelectronic 4.Light-emitting devices 5.Properties of materials 6.Optical couplers

notes: 光電所和電資國際班合開

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。   光學元件、光學系統、精密機械元件、精密機械系統、光機系統之實務設計與個案研究
description.en: Optical elements, optical systems, elements of precision machinery, precision mechanical systems, optical machinery design and case study.

notes: 光電所和電資國際班合開

description.zh: 1.基本分析工具介紹(6) 2.基本光學系統--近軸光學(6) 3.光學系統元件介紹(6) 4.像差理論(6) 5.像質評估(6) 6.光學系統設計(6)7.光學套裝軟體使用(6) 8.光電設計專題(9)
description.en: 1.The tools                     2.The basic optical systems3.Basic optical devices            4.Seidel aberrations5.Image evaluation               6.The design of optical systems7.The use of Zemax              8.Project on optical design

notes: 電腦教室,光電三、四和光電所合開

description.zh: 超快雷射由於其脈衝寬度在皮秒(10-12)之下，它在軍事科技、工業應用、生醫檢測與學術研究所扮演的角色日益重要，本課程將介紹超短脈衝雷射的種類，尤其著重在光纖短脈衝雷產生的原理、脈衝壓縮的技術與超短脈衝寬度與相位量測的技術，此外也將介紹超快雷射的各種應用包括光譜量測、泵-探量測與非線性光學量測等技術。
description.en: Due to relative short pulse below one picosecond, ultrafast lasers have been widely used in various fields including military, industry, biomedical diagnosis and scientific research.  In this course, it will introduce various kinds of the ultrafast lases, especially on the principle of mode-locked fiber generation, pulse compression technique and the method of the ultrashort pulsewidth measurement as well as phase retrieval.  Various applications of ultrafast laser including fluorescence, pump-probe and nonlinear optical measurement have also been introduced in this course.

notes: 光電所和電資國際班合開

description.zh: 本課程將使學生熟悉專業筆譯的重要概念與原則。學生將習得翻譯學領域中各種跨學科的理論觀點（例如語言學與功能主義取向、言談與語域分析、翻譯規範、文化轉向、翻譯社會學以及翻譯科技等），並將理論知識運用於中英／英中翻譯實務上。學生將深入探討各種翻譯論點，並以此為基礎進行文本分析、釐清翻譯問題，以及構思合適之翻譯策略與技巧。
description.en: This course will acquaint students with fundamental concepts and principles of professional translation. Students will acquire a solid grounding in a range of ideas within translation studies (e.g. linguistic and functionalist approaches, discourse and register analysis, translation norms, cultural turn, sociology of translation, and translation technologies) and apply the theoretical knowledge to various English and Chinese translation activities. This course will also enable students to critically discuss the basic postulates of translation theories and use them in text analysis, the identification of translation problems, and the formulation of suitable strategies and techniques.

description.zh: 本課程將針對英語授課 (English as a medium of instruction, EMI)及學科與語言整合教學 (Content and Language Integrated Learning , CLIL)兩大領域範疇進行深入探究，本課程將探討不同主題包含：EMI/CLIL不同的理論架構、EMI/CLIL於不同學科上之應用、以及EMI/CLIL於不同教育階段的應用等主題，並透過課堂討論、小組活動、個案研究以及專題提案討論，提升學生對相關主題的知識建構與教學能力，建立其對EMI/CLIL主題於文獻探討之掌握及相關研究方法，並期將所學之知能應用在課堂教學中。
description.en: This course in an introductory course for English as a Medium of Instruction (EMI) and Content and Language Integrated Learning (CLIL). This course aims to cultivate students’ knowledge about EMI and CLIL and their applications in different disciplines across different educational levels. The elements of teaching subject areas in English will be discussed in class to equip students with the basic concepts and techniques for EMI and CLIL. Through various class activities such as lectures, discussions, case studies, group work, and larger projects, students will explore not only the theorical foundations for EMI and CLIL but also classroom pedagogy and methodological approaches related to EMI and CLIL. The promises and challenges of EMI and CLIL and emerging issues will also be discussed in this course.

description.zh: 本課程由機械工程的角度出發，結合基礎電化學原理，介紹燃料電池的基本原理及種類，由最新市場發展現況導入，介紹燃料電池的發展歷史及最新現況，同時說明提升燃料電池效率及壽命的關鍵影響因素，結合實作方式深入了解燃料電池特性。
description.en: This course is based on the principle of mechanical engineering and electrochemical theory to introduce the basic principles and types of fuel cells. From the latest development in the global market, the course will introduce the fuel cell history and the latest products of fuel cells. The improvement of fuel cell efficiency and lifetime will be explained through   fundamental theory and experiments.

name.en: Principle and application of fuel cell

description.zh: 於2009年，ASTM定義了積層製造，並將此積層製造分成七大類型，本課程將對它進行光機電原理說明，並以積層製造系統的應用及系統的研發為主要授課方向。
description.en: ASTM Committee F42 on Additive Manufacturing Technologies was formed in 2009. The myriad process names into seven standardized terms. In this course, the principle of the additive manufacturing technology in terms of its opto-electro-mechanical-system will be discussed. The application and the system development of additive manufacturing are the major topics of this course.

notes: 限30人/機電所、機電博合開

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。機構的類型合成與數目合成。創造性機構合成。運動、路徑和函數產生器之尺寸合成。最佳化設計。球面機構及空間機構之介紹。
description.en: Type Synthesis and Number Synthesis of Mechanisms. Creative Mechanism Synthesis.  Dimensional Synthesis of Motion, Path, and Function Generators.  Optimal Design. Introduction of Spherical Mechanisms and Spatial Mechanisms.

notes: 限40人/機電所、機電博、車輛外生合開

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意介紹雷射加工之理論及實務，注重製程參數之研究，教導學生如何掌握製程，以達到精密製造的要求。內容包括雷射輔助製造程序、雷射加工設備、雷射加工原理、系統分析、實驗設計、雷射加工實例。
description.en: Introducing theory and practice of laser material processing. Emphasizing the study of manufacturing factors. Letting the students know how to control manufacturing process, and fulfill the demand of precision manufacturing. The course content is : laser assisted manufacturing processes, facilities for laser material processing, the principles of laser material processing, system analysis, examples of laser material processing.

description.zh: 如何藉由商務模型的分析，建置數位化協同產品設計與開發環境，並說明資料管理、構型管隨著網路時代的來臨，不但造成數位化協同產品設計與開發觀念的興起，也造成數位化協同平台技術逐漸成熟，並且將同步工程觀念的實現更往前邁進一大步。本課程是從數位化協同產品設計與開發概念之介紹開始，使學生明白數位化協同產品設計與開發在現代製造業中的重要性，接著介紹理與工作流程管理等相關實務應用觀念。
description.en: Information and network technologies have promoted the traditional concurrent engineering to the next generation. The collaborative e-design and e-development concept has been more popular in industries. This course is introduced from the concept of collaborative product design and development to help students understanding the importance of collaborative e-design and e-development in modern industries. Furthermore, the business model analysis method is provided to construct the collaborative environment of e-design and e-development. In addition, some real cases of data management, configuration management, and workflow management are mentioned.

name.zh: 數位化設計與開發特論
name.en: Special Topics on e-Design and e-Development

description.zh: 如何藉由商務模型的分析，建置數位化協同產品設計與開發環境，並說明資料管理、構型管隨著網路時代的來臨，不但造成數位化協同產品設計與開發觀念的興起，也造成數位化協同平台技術逐漸成熟，並且將同步工程觀念的實現更往前邁進一大步。本課程是從數位化協同產品設計與開發概念之介紹開始，使學生明白數位化協同產品設計與開發在現代製造業中的重要性，接著介紹理與工作流程管理等相關實務應用觀念。
description.en: Information and network technologies have promoted the traditional concurrent engineering to the next generation. The collaborative e-design and e-development concept has been more popular in industries. This course is introduced from the concept of collaborative product design and development to help students understanding the importance of collaborative e-design and e-development in modern industries. Furthermore, the business model analysis method is provided to construct the collaborative environment of e-design and e-development. In addition, some real cases of data management, configuration management, and workflow management are mentioned.

name.zh: 數位化設計與開發特論
name.en: Special Topics on e-Design and e-Development

description.zh: 控制理論及應用簡介、線性空間及線性運算子、線性動態方程式及反應、可控制性可觀測性及穩定性、狀態回授及狀態預估、多變數I/O控制器設計及應用。
description.en: Introduction, Linear spaces and linear operators, linear dynamic equations, controllability, observability, stability analysis, state feedback and state prediction, multi-input multi-output systems, controller design and application.

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋半導體產業趨勢發展、超大型(Giga)半導體工廠廠務系統與先進自動化工廠運作、以及先進半導體製程技術和設備等三大部分。
description.en: This course mainly consists of development trend, Giga FAB, FAB automation, and processing technology and equipment for advanced semiconductor manufacturing.

name.zh: 積體電路製程先進技術與設備
name.en: Processing technology and equipment for advanced semiconductor manufacturing

description.zh: Z-轉換、取樣資料系統、等效於連續函數的數位濾波器設計、使用轉換技術設計數位控制系統、使用狀態空間設計數位控制系統、電腦控制。
description.en: Z-Transform, Sampled-Data Systems, Discrete Equivalents to Continuous Transfer Functions: The Digital Filter, Design of Digital Control Systems Using Transform Techniques, Design of Digital Control Systems Using State-Space Methods, Application and Practice of Digital Control, Case Study.

description.zh: 使學員瞭解Python程式語言於機器學習應用，以及機器學習的理論背景、評估如何使用適當的演算法於實際例子、內容包括回歸分析於資料預測、資料維度減少方法於資料特徵提取、資料分類方法包括支援向量機與類神經網路方法。課程主要配合Python例子增進學員了解機器學習的相關知識與提升在資訊處理時代之競爭力。
description.en: Students should be familiar with the basic concepts of machine learning (ML), probability theory, probability distribution, ML algorithms for classification, regression, and clustering taught in this class.

description.zh: 機械手臂基礎理論，內容包含座標轉換、機械臂運動學、反運動學、動力學、軌跡規畫、機械臂設計、機械臂控制、機械臂的程式語言等。
description.en: It is a fundamental course concerning the theories of robotic manipulators. Topics contain frame transformations, manipulator kinematics, inverse kinematics, dynamics, trajectory planning, manipulator design, control of manipulators, robot programming languages.

description.zh: 奈微米工程於生物醫學之應用日趨重要，量測與操作工具的開發與實際的生醫應用對象的大小尺寸具有密切的相關性，對於生物系統的充份瞭解是工程表現的重要過程之一。在此課程中將配合本校實驗室目前之相關研究設備進行原理講解與應用討論，包括之項目將由分子、細胞到組織之感測、分析與操縱。選修學生須依下列重點：奈微米生醫感測系統、奈米生醫材料、奈米生醫光電以及實驗室晶片等領域選擇期中期末報告之題目與計畫內容，主要要求在尋求創新思考方向，以求在原理或應用上的突破，積極推動跨領域與技術先進之整合性研究。
description.en: Nano/micro engineering in bio-medicine applications has become increasingly important. The development and operation of measurement tool for biomedical applications has a close correlation to the actual size of the object. In this course we will explain the principles of devices and discuss the applications based on the school's research laboratories, including sensing, analysis and manipulation of molecules, cells, and tissues. Students will be required to do a project about Nano-micron biomedical sensor systems, nano-biomaterials and nano-biomedical areas such as optical and lab-chip. The interim and final report should devote to the topic and plans in the search for the direction of Creative Thinking with a view to the breakthrough of theory or application, and actively promote the integration of advanced interdisciplinary research and technology.

description.zh: 電機機械、電力系統設計與匹配、電動機驅動與設計、光電原理等及實驗(作)。
description.en: Basic Electrical Engineering training for students with Mechanical Engineering major. The goal of this course is to get familiar with the building blocks of electrical systems in Mechatronic applications. Major topics include Electrical machines, Motor Drives, Power Amplifiers, Power Electronics, and OP-Amp related signal processing circuits. Lectures are given to illustrate the function of the each block in electrical systems. And then the students can conduct experiment to explore relevant circuits in order to obtain thorough understanding of their characteristics.

notes: 機電所和製科所合開/限21人

description.zh: 機械動態系統及表示法、變分原理(Variational Principles)、Lagrange方程式、Hamilton原理、系統分析、迴歸性判別法、判別法則及選定、控制應用。
description.en: Dynamical system representation and Modeling of Mechanical systems, Variational Principles Lagrange equation, Hamiltion Principles, System Analysis, System Identification and Application.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意本課程介紹有限元素分析法基本原理及其在各種工程問題上之應用。1. 有限元素分析法之基本觀念2. 利用變分原理建立有限元素模式3. 形狀函數及等參數元素4. 一維問題:桿、桁架、樑及骨架等5. 二維問題:平面應力應變及板殼問題。6. 三維問題:一般實體7. 有限元素分析之計算機程式處理8. 有限元素分析於動態問題之應用9. 相關有限元素分析套裝軟體簡介
description.en: To introduce the basic principle of the finite element analysis and its application in solving various types of engineering problems.1. Introduction to the basic concepts of the finite element analysis2. Formulation of the finite models through the use of variational principles3. Shape functions and isoparametric elements4. One dimensional problems: rod, truss, beam, frame, etc.5. Two dimensional problems: plane stress, plane strain and plate, etc.6. Three dimensional problems: typical solids7. Implementation of the FEM computation by computer8. Finite element applications in dynamic problems9. Survey of some finite-element software systems

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹奈米結構材料之合成及其製程技術。內容大綱包括三部分：第一、奈米材料基本物理與化學特性，第二、奈米粉末和薄膜結構材料之化學合成，物理合成製程原理與特性，奈米塊體材料的性能與製備，第三、奈米結構材料應用。
description.en: This course is divided into three sections. The first four chapters deal with those chapters which are the principles of nanostructured Material. The next two chapters describe the engineering options currently available for the synthesis, processing and fabrication of nanostructured materials. The last two chapters deal with different application of nanostructured materials.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。精密機械之機械控制，電氣控制，數值控制，幾何數據處理，驅動系統，適應控制系統，監視系統與診斷系統，機器人控制，電腦整合精密機械系統．
description.en: Mechanical control, electrical control, numerical control, geometric data processing, drive systems, adaptive control systems, monitoring and diagnostic systems, Computer Integrated precision Machinery Systems.

notes: 製科所必選課程之一，限25人

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹綠色科技及其在二十一世紀對人類生活的影響，內容包括現今幾個最重要的「潔能」與「節能」科技，以及一些「環保」相關科技。「潔能科技」包括風力能、太陽能、水力能、地球內部能源、生質能、路面能、聲音能、燃料電池、電動車等；「節能科技」包括節能住宅、變頻空調等；「環保科技」則包括碳回收主題。介紹內容包括各項技術原理介紹及其發展概況。
description.en: This course aims to introduce green technologies and their influences on human life in the 21st century. The contents consist of the most important topics about the clean energy and energy conservation technologies. The clean energy technology consists of wind energy, solar energy, hydraulic energy, earth interior energy, bioenergy, roadway energy, sound energy, fuel cell, electric vehicles, and so on. The energy conservation technology consists energy save buildings, variable frequency air-condition, etc.. The environmental protesting technology includes carbon recapture etc.. This course will talk the technical principles and their general developing situations.

notes: 限30人/機電所、機電博、車輛外生合開

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意表面現象, 介面反應等與近代高科技技術, 如鍍膜工程,表面處理, 腐蝕, 磨潤, 微機電, 感測器, 半導體技術等息息相關, 且日益重要。表面分析是原子層次的相關研究, 它包括振動, 電子或離子頻譜分析, 微技術等之應用。主要的項目包含, 表面形貌觀察( SEM, BSEM, AFM ), 成份分析( 光譜分析, 質譜分析, EDX ), 結構分析( XRD, AES, ESCA, XPS ), 鍵結分析( Raman光譜, FTIR ), 表面粗糙度, 膜厚, 附著力, 內應力等膜之特性分析。
description.en: Surface phenomena and processes occurring at interface are becoming increasingly important in a wide variety of industrial applications including the areas of films coating surface treatments, conclusion, triobology, microelectronics, sensors and semi-conductor technologies.  Accompanying this is an ever-growing need for surface characterization allowing better definition of processes occurring at a microscopic level.Surface analysis is the use of vibration, electron or ion spectroscopic and microscopic techniques for the study of material at the atomic level, it includesSEM, AFM, XRD, EDX, ESCA, XPS, AES, Raman Spectrum, and FTIR analysis.

description.zh: 微加工程序含MUMPS，打樣、沉積、蝕刻；設計工具含MEMCAD, Matlab, EM software, and Ansys 等；應用例含壓力感測器、加速度計、探針卡、微波元件、生物晶片等；最後介紹封裝與測試技術。
description.en: 1. Introductions of Microsystem 2. Micromachining Processes include MUMPS, Pattern, Deposition, Etching 3. Design Tool include MEMCAD, Matlab, EM software, and Ansys 4.Applications include Pressure sensor, Accelerometer, …,etc, -probe card and other, RFMEMS, BioMEMS 5.Packaging and testing.

description.zh: 智慧型製造系統、2.MES 系統、3.通訊介面標準與設計、4.遠端監控、5.智慧型偵測與診斷、6.容錯系統、7.介面整合
description.en: 1.Introduction on intelligent manufacturing system 2.MES system 3.Standard and design for communication interfaces 4.Remote monitoring 5.Intelligent monitoring and diagnostics 6.Faults tolerant system 7.Integration for interfaces

description.zh: 社會設計，目前在國內雖較少被提出討論，但卻是近年來國外在探討企業創新時的關鍵趨勢。因此本課程將邀請各界專家分享他們是什麼契機下開始關注社會設計，也分別舉出幾個國內、外的實例來說明，並將結合互動媒體的科技優勢來進行創作。因為社會設計不應只被視為政府單位或非營利組織的推動事務，其實每一個人或民間企業，都極有可能運用設計來創造出很不一樣的社會價值。
description.en: Social design have been much discussed widespread in business innovation but rarely in Taiwan. In this course, we invite experts to share at what moment they begin to focus on social design, giving examples worldwide, and creating works that combine interactive media. Social design is not just a policy that run by government or non-governmental organization, you and I can use design to create unique social value.

description.zh: 本課程將透過介紹及研讀創新服務的標竿案例，以了解創新服務的本質與實質效益。學生將透過共同研討與分組實作的的方式，針對不同場域及技術的創新服務，透過資源整合的方式，提出具體的創新服務專案，並提出其評估的方法。
description.en: This course will provide the student basics knowledge and practical benefits of the innovative services through benchmark case introduction and study. Students will collaborate to each other to propose practical innovation service project proposal in the aspect of resources management, technology applications, service mechanism and associated assessment methods  in various domains.

notes: 日職碩合開,排進修部教室

description.zh: 互動設計可視為三大傳統設計領域：平面設計、工業設計，與建築設計的延伸。在許許多多延伸出來的新設計領域如 UI、UX、響應式網頁、互動產品、智慧空間等等，圖像依舊是所有設計在發想、討論，與實現設計上所仰賴的根本工具。本課程以圖像為設計語言的架構下，介紹由圖像所發展出來的數位生產線，以模組技術介紹互動設計在設計發想、原型製作，以至到設計討論與提案所需要之圖像技術，並鼓勵學生以一設計提案來總結課堂之所學。
description.en: Interaction design can be considered as an extension of the long-established fields of architectural, industrial, and graphical design. Regardless what types of the recent emerging field of interaction design such as UI, UX, responsive website, tangible interaction design, or smart environment, the image remains as the visual language for design ideation to realization. This course introduces the concept of digital pipeline which is mediated on wide range of image related digital technologies. Through those modularized technologies, we can form a working pipeline to create a prototype for an interaction design proposal.

notes: 排光華409,建議碩一選修,外碩,日碩,職碩,設計博合開

description.zh: 此課程旨在使學生了解如何以科學方法研究物理刺激與認知感官之間的關係，並採用信號偵測理論，進而考量人因工程於產品、系統設計之應用。
description.en: The goal of the course is to empower students in learning the scientific approach of psychophysics, the relation between physical stimuli and human sensations and perceptions, applying the method of signal detection theory. Further applications applying human factors and ergonomics in product development and system design are considered.

name.zh: 心理物理學與信號偵測理論

description.zh: 使用者導向之設計已成為大多數互動設計的依循主軸。他翻轉了以產品為導向的傳統，強調以使用者的偏好引領設計的價值。而這就是設計思考的方法導入互動設計中，利用其敏感性和方法，透過可行及可用的技術滿足使用者的需求，從而產生使用者價值並發展市場機會。研究建議，由世界級的設計公司IDEO所主導，設計思考與決策科學相結合，觸發了同理心設計與工程技術的融合。這不僅可以確保提出兼容實際性和創造性地問題解決方案外，而且在設計的開始便融入使用者導向的設計概念，將有助於創新設計與解決方案的提出。同時，在設計的初始階段導入資料應用與分析的方法，更能在設計中正確的整合敏感性，技術可行性，商轉可行性和使用者的需求。本課程主要的概念在於利用設計思考以使用者導向之設計方法，將使用者及其需求作為設計提案以及解決方案的啟始點，並整合分析設計對象，使用者所遭遇的問題，以及如何提高性能以及實現可擴展性等問題。並透過資料科學與工具的整合應用，導引資料分析人員與設計專業人員進行跨領域的整合，以建構未來設計創新的機會與願景。因此，本課程的主要目標是：1.建構以用戶為導向之人本設計重要設計流程。2.使用高品質的數據，可以創建設計工件，
description.en: As the user-center design is becoming the core of most interaction design (IxD), it has become a popular belief that it is no longer the product that leads but users and user preferences that's leading the game. This is where design thinking steps in, where IxD uses their sensibility and methods to match users' need in a way that is technologically feasible and viable enough to generate user value and tap market opportunity. Suggested by some studies, brought in vogue by the popular design firm IDEO, design thinking when combined with decision science results in an infusion of empathy with engineering. This not only ensures a practical and creative resolution of problems but also puts the user at the center of applications and at the starting point to develop new designs and solutions. Meanwhile, ensuring design in analytics projects from the initial stages can lead to the right blend of sensibility, technical feasibility, business viability, and consumer needs.The idea is, design th

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹英語全球化、全球英語，以及英語作為國際語言的發展與相關論述，並針對英語在全球擴散的現象，檢視相關的概念與理論。本課程將探討因英語全球化所造成，在社會語言學、文化、政治經濟與教育等方面的重要議題，以及與全球英語相關的議題與爭論。
description.en: This course aims to provide students with an overview of the spread of the English language around the world, the emergence of English varieties, and the development of the popularization of English as a lingua franca. It examines the various concepts and theories developed in academia to account for the unprecedented global expansion of English. Through readings and class discussion, this course will look at key sociolinguistic, cultural, politico-economic and educational issues arising from the spread of English as well as the current issues and debates surrounding Global Englishes. Students will be encouraged to conduct original research on or detailed analysis of the implications of English as the international language.

description.zh: 本課程目標在提供學生英漢與漢英口譯專業訓練。課程內容含括專業逐步與同步口譯技巧，以及口譯過程與訓練的學術理論。重點將置於重述、記憶訓練、數字與語法轉換、筆記與跟述練習，以累積逐步與同步口譯技巧。
description.en: This course aims to provide students with professional training in aspects of Chinese<->English interpreting. Course contents will cover both techniques in professional consecutive and simultaneous interpreting and academic research in the interpreting process and training. Emphasis will be placed on paraphrase, recall, numeric and syntactic conversion, note-taking and shadowing, which will lead to build-up skills in consecutive and simultaneous interpreting.

description.zh: 為增強ESL/EFL學生的整體的語文能力與跨文化溝通的軟實力，流傳各國的有名故事可採用來作為學生研讀、討論與從事再次創造的素材。這些故事包括人們鍾愛幾世紀的老故事，它們後來幾世代的版本，現代的改寫，與時尚的扭曲變種。依照不同主題被歸納成組(例如：灰姑娘情結，哀怨邪惡的後母，攀龍附鳳的赤貧男子等等)並以多媒體教學方法，藉由閱讀跨文化與跨世代的故事裡強化英語的教與學。
description.en: In both ESL and EFL classrooms, English serves not only as a means to conduct daily communication but also as a media to explore diversified subjects and fields. To build up students’ communicative competence, famous stories and popular tales prove to be resourceful because of their richness in linguistic, cultural, and psychological significance. In this course, multi-cultural stories (including archetypal tales, classic fairy tales, their modern counterparts, and their twisted revisions) are carefully selected and organized according to their main theme. For future teachers taking this course, the instructor will demonstrate how this approach can be actually practiced to best benefit ESL/EFL students. In the practicum section, future teachers are required to try their hands in using these stories.

name.zh: 文化故事與英語教學應用
name.en: Using Cultural Stories in ESL/EFL Classrooms

description.zh: 智慧型製造系統、2.MES 系統、3.通訊介面標準與設計、4.遠端監控、5.智慧型偵測與診斷、6.容錯系統、7.介面整合
description.en: 1.Introduction on intelligent manufacturing system 2.MES system 3.Standard and design for communication interfaces 4.Remote monitoring 5.Intelligent monitoring and diagnostics 6.Faults tolerant system 7.Integration for interfaces

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹自動化光學精密檢測相關技術，內容包括如下：前言，精密量測概論，機器視覺原理，二維光學檢測技術及實習，三維光學檢測技術及實習，影像處理與人工智慧技術運用，智慧型量測系統及應用，系統整合之相關技術，產業相關技術應用，及結論。
description.en: This subject is arranged to introduce the principles and techniques required in Automatic Optical Inspection (AOI). The subject includes the following subtopics: introduction to precision metrology and machine vision, the measurement principles and methods used in the 2D AOI, the measurement principles and techniques used in the 3D AOI, image processing and artificial intelligence methods used in automatic inspection, intelligent measurement systems, AOI system integration and conclusion.

notes: 限24人/製科所必選課程之一

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、製造科技相關技術及產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等，可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Workshop, Group discussion, Seminars, Manufacturing Technology in Modern Industries.

description.zh: 本門課之目的是讓學生熟悉質與量研究方法的設計。主題涵蓋研究計劃之準備及撰擬 ;主要研究方法，如調查研究法、相關研究法、實驗研究法、行動研究法；質性和量化資料之搜集與分析；敘述統計和推論統計。
description.en: This course familiarizes students with qualitative and quantitative research procedures and the statistical design involved in education and applied linguistics research. Topics will include the nature and process of research; survey research; experimental research; correlational research; action research; data collection and data analysis; descriptive statistics; and sampling and inferential statistics.

description.zh: 生醫製造是新穎的工程領域，是跨基礎科學與工程製造領域的實用科技，本課程專注於生醫製造方法的需求規範、製造原理的解說以及相關的新興領域的應用。在技術方面，生醫製造技術涉及積層製造技術、生物噴印技術、生醫材料、支架結構設計、細胞培養和動物實驗等相關知識。此課程也會說明斷層掃描影像重建人體模型的流程，支架內部孔隙設計對強度的影響，生物列印機的組裝技巧與規範，FDA對生物列印的規範，人工肉品的細胞培養與製造；另外，在應用於藥物開發方面，生醫製造學目前在再生醫學，藥物和組織工程等領域的應用案例說明，以及未來趨勢的分析與討論。
description.en: Biofabrication is a practical guide to the novel, inherently cross-disciplinary scientific field that focuses on biomanufacturing processes and a related range of emerging technologies. These processes and technologies ultimately further the development of products that may involve living (cells and/or tissues) and nonliving (bio-supportive proteins, scaffolds) components. The course introduces students to cell printing, patterning, assembling, 3D scaffold fabrication, cell/tissue-on-chips as a coherent micro-/nano-fabrication toolkit. Real-world examples illustrate how to apply biofabrication techniques in areas such as regenerative medicine, pharmaceuticals and tissue engineering.

notes: 限24人/機電所、製科所和機械自動外生班合開

description.zh: 老人醫學基礎、 老人藥物學概論、 老人預防醫學概論、 老人醫療倫理與醫療效益概論、 老人永續照護概論 、老人感染與傳染病防治概論、老人精神照護概論、老人一般醫學概論、 老人急重症醫學概論、 老人醫療與生活科技技術概論
description.en: 1. General principle of aging  2. Geriatric pharmacy  3. Preventive geriatrics  4. Ethics and medical effects in geriatrics  5. Perpetual geriatric care  6. Infections management and prevention in elderly  7. Psychogeriatric care  8. General geriatrics 9. Geriatric emergency medical care 10. LOHAS (Lifestyles of Health and Sustainability) technology,

description.zh: 課程旨通過對電影的討論與分析，得以進入隱喻、符號、作者論、窺視／凝視、時間與記憶、聲音、電影現象學等論述的理解，並在過程中，探討電影與社會，乃至於與個體生命之間的意義與議題。
description.en: This course aims to study the theories, analysis methods and discussions over the concerns in film studies, including metaphors, symbols, auteur theory, voyeurism/ gaze, temporality and memory, sound, and film phenomenology. With the tutor-led discussions and screenings, we will explore the significances between the cinema and the society, or the cinema and individuals.

name.en: The Symbols and Interpretation in Films

description.zh: 本課程為任職於英語教育之教師所設計，主旨在於分析數位教材於英語教學中的角色。藉由電腦/科技輔助語言教學、電腦媒介溝通、以及線上教學相關理論、研究與應用的研討來瞭解數位教材如何輔助英語學習。因應數位教材與學習者特性所採用之評量、評估、以及施測方法亦將是本課程重點。
description.en: This course is designed for in-service English teachers to analyze the pedagogical role of electronic courseware in the language classroom. Theories and studies of CALL (computer-assisted language learning), TELL (technology-enhanced language learning), CMC (computer-mediated communication), and online learning will be discussed to understand the utilization of electronic courseware in assisting English learning. Assessment, evaluation, and testing measurements in responding to electronic courseware and to learner characteristics will also be discussed.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.
