description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 專題討論本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程之目的將探討酵素的功能及結構。針對醣類水解?水解各式各樣的多醣類做詳細探討。將目前已歸類的96家族中有晶體結構的家族中選出幾種家族做詳細的學習。從已發表文獻中來瞭解水解?可特定水解多醣類的特性。
description.en: This course will focus on glycoside hydrolases that hydrolyze various carbohydrates. Glycoside hydrolases have been classified to 96 families to date. The number of enzymes will be increase by time.

notes: 中英文授課   與在職碩士班合開(上課時間四ABC)

description.zh: 本課程之目的將探討酵素的功能及結構。針對醣類水解?水解各式各樣的多醣類做詳細探討。將目前已歸類的96家族中有晶體結構的家族中選出幾種家族做詳細的學習。從已發表文獻中來瞭解水解?可特定水解多醣類的特性。
description.en: This course will focus on glycoside hydrolases that hydrolyze various carbohydrates. Glycoside hydrolases have been classified to 96 families to date. The number of enzymes will be increase by time.

notes: 中英文授課   與高分所研究所合開(上課時間四ABC)

description.zh: 先修課程：指導教授同意科技研發專案管理之個案研究. 有關科技開發案之技術開發管理, 人力責任管理及時間任務管理等PDCA (Plan, Do, Check, Action)之實務探討
description.en: The cases study of the management of R/D projects. The method of PDCA (Plan, Do, Check, Action) cycling will be studied and discussed in each case.

description.zh: 此課程旨在說明決策理論之基本觀念，及其在真實世界裡相關決策問題之分析。使學生具備了解並建構決策問題，建構並推估決策之不確定性，以及建構並評估效用模式之能力。
description.en: This course provides an overview of the basic concepts of decision theory and their applications on the real-world decision problems. Students will learn about the problem identification and modeling, the modeling and estimation of the associated uncertainty, and modeling and evaluation of the utility function.

description.zh: 公司治理已成為廿一世紀企業組織架構調整之重大議題，如何經由管理策略及法制設計使台灣企業經營回歸股東長期價值及利益，為政府、交易所與公會等自律機關、及企業經營者必須面對之問題。在法制上，獨立董事監察人、審計委員會之設置、公司自律守則之擬議、股東會之運作，均衝擊我國公司法、證券交易法及交易所規則現行管理架構及規範；在實務上，上市櫃公司如何順利接受公司治理之理念及管理規範，以提昇公司營運的外在評價與體質。
description.en: The corporate governance had been the enterprise framework adjustment of the main issue of the 21 century. How do the manage the corporate strategy and system of the law to make the profit for the shareholder, government and enterprise. The main purpose of the course to help the learner to understand the law of corporate and the practice of the enterprise.

description.zh: 本課程教授人工智慧技術的基礎理論與實務技巧，並對於人工智慧在製造業、服務業、金融業的應用，提供啟發性的基本認知與創意，以激發學生在人工智慧領域的創新應用。課程內容包括: 人工智慧基礎、機器學習、大數據技術、深度學習、生成對抗網路、創業家思維、設計思考、商業模式、人工智慧與現代科技、工業 4.0、人工智慧的製造業應用個案、人工智慧的服務業應用個案、人工智慧的金融應用個案。
description.en: This course aims to teach students the basic concepts and practical techniques of artificial intelligence and to introduce its applications on manufacturing, service, and finance industries. The course focuses on inspring students for innovative artificial intelligence applications. The course includes: artificial intelligence basics, machine learn-ing, big data, deep learning, generative adversarial network, entrepreneurial thoughts, design thinking, business models, artificial intelligence and modern technologies, industry 4.0, real case applications on manufacturing, service, finance industries.

description.zh: 本課程是教導學生金融科技的基本概念，使學生能夠建立金融科技的創新應用。內容包括:金融科技概論、金融科技商業模式、P2P 借貸、虛擬貨幣、雲端服務、第三方支付、群眾募資、P2P 匯兌、區塊鏈、跨境電商、程式交易、機器人理財與期末專題製做。
description.en: This course is to instruct students the basic concepts of financial technology and to enable students to develop innovative applications of financial technology. The contents include introduction to financial technology, business models of financial technology, P2P lending, virtual money, third-party payment, crowd funding, P2P remittance, blockchain, cross-border e-commerce, program trading, and robotic financial advisory.

description.zh: 資訊安全以全面觀點說明執行完整的資訊與通訊安全管理所需考量的各個層面，課程包括：資訊安全管理國際標準、資訊安全政策與組織、人力資源安全、資產管理、存取控制、密碼學與金鑰管理、實體與環境安全、作業與通訊管理 系統獲取、開發及維護、供應商管理、資訊安全事故管理、營運持續管理之資訊安全層面、制度及法規的遵循
description.en: Information Security provides a comprehensive view of information and communication security. This course content includes as follows: information security management international standards, information security policy and organization, human resource security, asset management, access control, cryptography and key management, physical and environmental security, operations and communication management system acquisition, development and maintenance, supplier management, information security incident management, operational sustainability management, information security aspects, systems and regulatory compliance.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹人力資源與組織管理的進階理論與實務，內容包括了(但不限於)人才任用、訓練與發展、績效評估、薪酬管理、組織設計、領導、工作激勵、以及工作團隊運作等等重要議題。課堂上並討論上述理論對於管理實務上的意涵。
description.en: This course introduces many advanced topics of human resource management, organization theory, and organization behavior. Topics include (but not limited to) staffing, training and development, performance appraisal, compensation, organization design, leadership, work motivation, workgroup functioning. Implications for managerial practice will be discussed in this class.

description.zh: 本課程主要內容包括：（1）生產策略（2）產品設計與規劃（3）製程設計與規劃（4）廠址選擇（5）產能規劃（6）資源需求規劃（7）品質管理（8）物料管理（9）存貨管制。
description.en: The course mainly includes following topics：（1）operation strategy, （2）products planning and designing, （3）process planning and designing,（4）location strategy, （5）capacity planning, （6）material requirement planning, （7）quality management, （8）material management,（9）inventory management.

description.zh: 資訊科技是整合策略，使用者和組織系統，幫助高階主管達成組織目標，以及了解資訊科技。本課程學習主題：透過資訊系統獲取策略優勢，透過資訊系統應用，支援管理和執行資訊科技應用，獲得競爭優勢。全課程以哈佛個案研討方式進行。
description.en: The need for information-based support for managers is increasing as the modern management imperatives of reach and to meet their organization's goals. Information management function provides information to support operations, management analysis, and decision- making functions in an organization. We will also look at the role in formation play in helping managers meet goals by examining the characteristics of information systems that make managers' job easier. Topic of learning: Acquiring strategic advantage through information systems. Supporting managers and executives through IS applications. Managing the risk inherent in developing and using IS applications. Attaining and practicing technological leadership. This course is taught by HBS cases.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在探討如何運用量化的管理決策模型來解析管理上的各種問題，主要決策模型求解方法有：線性規劃、整數規劃、非線性規劃、層級分析法與網路分析法等。課程內容主要以案例說明為主，讓同學瞭解理論如何與實際問題結合，故課程中會用工程與管理上之各種實際應用問題做說明，最佳化求解軟體與決策工具軟體會用來進行問題求解與輔助說明所得數據之管理意涵，並進行模型成本效益分析。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to discuss how to use quantitative management decision-making models to analyze various management problems. The methods for solving the decision-making models include: linear programming, integer programming, nonlinear programming, hierarchical analysis process and network process etc. The course content is mainly based on case illustrations such that students can understand how the theory is combined with practical problems. Therefore, various practical application problems in engineering and management will be used to explain the models. Optimization software and decision-making tools will be used to solve the problems and assist in explaining the management implications of the obtained data, and perform model cost-benefit analysis.

description.zh: 資訊管理是整合使用者和組織系統，用以提供一個組織之操作支援，管理分析，和決策功能。我們以學習資訊工作者的角色，幫助經理滿足組織目標， 以及了解資訊科技，使經理工作更容易順暢。學習主題：透過資訊系統獲取策略優勢、透過資訊系統應用，支持經理和執行、發展資訊科技應用、獲得競爭優勢。
description.en: The need for information-based support for managers is increasing as the modern management imperatives of reach and to meet their organization's goals. Information management function provides information to support operations, management analysis, and decision- making functions in an organization. We will also look at the role in formation play in helping managers meet goals by examining the characteristics of information systems that make managers' job easier. Topic of learning: Acquiring strategic advantage through information systems. Supporting managers and executives through IS applications. Managing the risk inherent in developing and using IS applications. Attaining and practicing technological leadership.

description.zh: 網際網路與相關應用程式從根本上改變了消費者日常生活的各個方面。行銷從業人員也已經將他們的工作轉移到了網路上。本課程的目的在於幫助學生認識網路資料分析在數位行銷領域中的作用，並實際應用網路分析工具和技術來監控網路行銷活動的績效。課程主題包括：Web數據分析與行銷簡介、Web日誌分析、網站表現指標和關鍵績效指標、網站監控和趨勢分析、網路廣告及網路分析的未來趨勢。
description.en: The Internet and web applications have fundamentally changed nearly every aspect of our daily lives. Marketing practitioners have shifted their efforts online. This module aims to help students recognise the role of web analytics within the digital marketing landscape, and practically apply web analytics tools and technologies to monitor performance of web based marketing activities. Topics to be covered include: Introduction to web analytics and web data driven marketing; Web server log analysis; Web metrics and key web performance Indicators; Web monitoring and trends analysis; Dashboard design; Navigation analysis; Online advertising; Future trends of web analytics.

name.zh: 網路行銷研究與資料分析

description.zh: 本課程重點在探討全球供應鏈管理相關之基本議題。供應鏈管理主要是從供應商、製造商到最終顧客，對整個製造與配銷通路的整合性管理策略。本課程內容包含產業分析、e化概念、需求及供應管理、長鞭效應、存貨管理、延遲理論、及供應鏈管理實務。本課程同時還將探討全球供應鏈管理之策略發展、相關功能及主要風險與挑戰。
description.en: This course intends to introduce fundamental issues regarding global supply chain management. Supply chain management is an integrated approach to manage the total flow of manufacturing and distribution channel from supplier to ultimate customer. The contents of this course include industry analysis, E-business concept, demand and supply management, bullwhip effect, inventory management, postponement, and supply chain management practice. Certain topics related to supply chain management, such as the development of global supply chain management strategies, functions, risk, and challenges.

description.zh: 本課程介紹許多有關於組織中的個人、團隊與組織交互作用的研究。明確地說，本課程內容主要在探討如何改善員工績效與利社會行為，降低缺勤與離職率，以及提高工作滿足與組織承諾等員工態度。
description.en: This course introduces a variety of researches that investigates the interactions between individuals, groups, and organization. Specifically, it focuses on how to improve employee performance and prosocial behaviors, reduce absenteeism and turnover, and enhance job attitudes such as job satisfaction and organizational commitment.

description.zh: 資訊科技是整合策略，使用者和組織系統，幫助高階主管達成組織目標，以及了解資訊科技。本課程學習主題：透過資訊系統獲取策略優勢，透過資訊系統應用，支援管理和執行資訊科技應用，獲得競爭優勢。全課程以哈佛個案研討方式進行。
description.en: The need for information-based support for managers is increasing as the modern management imperatives of reach and to meet their organization's goals. Information management function provides information to support operations, management analysis, and decision- making functions in an organization. We will also look at the role in formation play in helping managers meet goals by examining the characteristics of information systems that make managers' job easier. Topic of learning: Acquiring strategic advantage through information systems. Supporting managers and executives through IS applications. Managing the risk inherent in developing and using IS applications. Attaining and practicing technological leadership. This course is taught by HBS cases.

description.zh: 多變量分析及處理二項以上變項的統計，分析技術、常用于管理，經濟，財務，會計等之分析‧ 課程內容：因素分析、主成份分析、複迴歸分析、區別分析、多變項異數分析典型相關分析、集群分析、聯合分析、直線方程式模式
description.en: Multivariate analysis is to analyze more then two variables simultaneously, and to be able to apply to management, economics, accounting…etc. The contents of the course: factor analysis, principal component analysis, multiple regression analysis, multiple discriminate analysis, multiple analysis of variance, canonical correlation analysis, cluster analysis, conjoint analysis, SEM…etc.

description.zh: 本課程可使學生瞭解：貨幣與資金市場、投資問題、如何取得資金與運用資金、使公司價值最大、使股東權益最大化、瞭解代理制度、瞭解公司股票、債務之利用，股利政策等事項‧
description.en: This course has provided: money and capital market、Investments 、How to obtaining and using funds、Maximize the value o their firms、How to maximize stockholders' stock、To know agency problem 、To know the price of the firm's stock, use of debt and dividend policy.

description.zh: 主要內容包含：企業研究的本質、研究流程、研究問題與假設、文獻評論、資料收集、操作性定義、測量、理論架構模型化、研究設計、量化與質化研究、個案研究法、資料分析與解釋、研究報告撰寫。
description.en: The course mainly discusses concepts of business research methods. The contents will include following topics：（1）the nature of business research, （2）elements of research and research process, （3）research problem and hypothesis,（4）literature review, （5）research design, （6）research proposal, （7）case study, （8）analysis and the interpretation of data, （9）quantitative and qualitative research,(10) research report.

description.zh: 課程包含以下主題1. 交流馬達簡介2. 交流馬達機電能量轉換基礎3. 磁性材料4. 交流馬達繞線5. 交流馬達設計原理6. 交流馬達之有限元素分析7. 交流馬達之機械設計
description.en: The contents of this course include:1. Introduction of AC motors2. Energy conversion and AC electric machine basics 3. Magnetic materials 4. AC electric machine winding 5. Design principles of AC electric machines6. Finite element analysis of AC electric machines 7. Mechanical design of AC electric machines

description.zh: 1.液晶材料的種類 2.液晶物理特性 3. 液晶顯示模式4. 薄膜電晶體元件物理4. 薄膜電晶體操作特性 5. 像素的結構及佈局 7. 顯示器的等效電路模型8. 顯示器驅動原理 9. 響應時間的驅動補償
description.en: 1. Types of liquid crystals  2. Physics of liquid crystals  3. Display modes and electro-optical properties  4. Properties of a-Si Thin film transistors  5. Operation of TFTs  6. Layouts of pixels with TFT switches  7. Circuit model of LCDs  8. Addressing of LCDs  9. Driving compensation for response time

name.zh: 液晶顯示器驅動電子學

description.zh: 以光纖取代傳統銅纜，可避免干擾，傳輸品質佳。且傳輸服務不中斷，網路架構簡單。此外高速FTTB線路具有客戶頻寬管理功能，可依客戶需求提供更彈性、更高頻寬(至1Gbps)。FTTB提供高速上網外，可提供企業VPN、都會網路、校園專案及互動式多媒體(MOD)等多樣寬頻服務。
description.en: Using fiber optics to replace coaxial cable, the method could avoid interference and achieve high-quality of transmission as well as no interrupting transmission services and simple network architectures. Besides, high-speed FTTB have management functionality of customer broadband, which can provide requirements of more flexibility and high bandwidth to customers. FTTB could offer Business VPN, Metropolitan Area Network, school project, MOD, and various broadband services...etc.

name.en: Application of Fiber Optical Broadband Network

description.zh: 修先課程：光學。 本課程利用傅氏轉換理論解釋繞射理論及光影像處理與光資訊處理技術，它包含：1.簡介 2.二維線性系統分析3.繞射理論 4.近場及遠場繞射5.透鏡之傅氏轉換與影像品質分析 6.影像系統之頻域分析7.空間濾波與光資訊處理 8.全像
description.en: This course illustrates the diffraction theory and techniques of image processing and optical information processing by using the methods of Fourier transform. It involves：1. Introduction2.Analysis of 2-D linear systems3.Diffraction theory 4.Fresnel and Fraunhofer diffraction5.Fourier transforming6.Frequency analysis of optical imaging properties of lenses 7.Spatial filtering and optical information processing8.Holography

description.zh: 本課程目的在介紹微觀之固體表面結構與現象。課程內容包括微觀之固體表面結構，固體表面之吸附、擴散、脫附現象，表面偏析現象，分子和表面間之鍵結，表面反應的熱力學與動力學，以及各種表面分析的技術。
description.en: This course is designated to acquaint the student with atomic-level understanding of surface structure and surface phenomena. The course focuses on the surproperties of the solid-gas and solid-vacuum interfaces because most of the results of modern surface-science studies on the atomic level come from the scrutiny of these interfaces. It contains the following topics: the atomic-level structure of clean and adsorbate-covered surfaces, adsorption and desorption, surface diffusion, surface segregation, the nature of the surface bonding, the adsorbate-adsorbate interaction, energy transfer during gas-surface interactions and surface reaction; surface analysis techniques.

description.zh: 最近數年應用電腦軟體來計算分子的幾何形狀與力學數據已變得相當熱門，這些軟體不但計算小分子相當快速，即使是很複雜的分子也可行。本課程探討現行染料化學所常用軟體的應用範圍、準確性與限制條件並舉數個例子來顯現其優點。
description.en: Within the last few years, computer programs have been developed which are based on force-field methods, allowing for fast calculations of the molecular geometry and dynamics of single molecules as well as more complex systems.This course is designed to provide a survey of the commonly used theoretical methods in dye chemistry,to discuss their scope and limitations, and to present some examples as illustrations of their advantages.

notes: 與分四合開 、因本課程含實作，人數限制20人

description.zh: 本課程的目的在介紹生物反應工程，也就是如何將工程原理應用在生物程序。本課程內容可分為二大部分：生物系統的概述與工程的原理應用，第一部分將包括細胞的結構、複製與生長，生物化學反應的種類及其特性，細胞的主要代謝路徑等，第二部分則探討生物反應器的種類及其操作特性與應用，生物反應器內的質傳、熱傳及流動型態，產品回收與純化。
description.en: The objective of the course is to introduce the fundamental concepts of bioprocess engineering, which is the application of engineering principles to design, develop, and analyze bioprocesses. The course will first survey the basics ideas from microbiology and biochemistry. Subsequently, the emphasis will be the application of engineering concepts to biological problems. The following topics will be included: enzyme kinetics, major metabolic pathways, cell growth, stoichiometry, bioreactor operation, and product recovery and purification.

description.zh: 本課程說明知識的定義、知識的分類、產業知識的產生和移轉，進而探討知識的創新，並利用知識管理提升產業生產及營運的效率，產業應用知識管理的概況和案例
description.en: This course is to explain definition of the knowledge, classification of the knowledge and generation and transfer of the knowledge. Moreover, the innovation of the knowledge will be discussed. Using knowledge management, it will improve the efficiency of the production and operation of the business. The applications and examples of the knowledge management will be included.

description.zh: 探討邊坡穩定、滲流、壓密及現地試驗土壤力學之分析方法(1)邊坡穩定分析理論及案例應用(2)平面滲流分析(3)壓密理論及沉陷分析(4)現地試驗土壤力學分析及其應用含電子震測錐試驗、平鈑膨脹儀試驗、水力破裂錐試驗及表面波震測試驗分析等。
description.en: 英課名：Advanced soil mechanics        Probe slope stability, seepage, consolidation and         soil mechanics analysis method of present the earth         test.      （1）The theory of slope stability analysis and case         application.      （2）Plane seepage analysis.      （3）Theory of consolidation and analysis of sink.      （4）Soil mechanics analysis of present the earth test         and that application. Include electron shake measure         cone test, plane expand instruments test, hydraulic         power rupture cone test and surface wave shake         measure test analysis, etc.

description.zh: 1.結構物劣化形態，介紹.2.目視檢測與非破性檢測。3.現況評估與分析。4.維修與補強設計。
description.en: 1.Reterioration types of concrete structures. 2.Visual an Non-estructive inspection. 3.Conition Evaluation and Analysis. 4.Maintenance and Repair Design.

name.zh: 結構物檢測評估及補強

description.zh: 本課程旨在對非工程類科出身之研究生，做有系統基礎材料科學之建立。課程包括(1)原子鍵結與配位(2)晶體[原子規律性](3)固相中之不規律性(4)相平衡(5)材料微結構(6)反應速率(7)材料破壞學(8)導電材與半導材料(9)陶瓷材料(10)聚合物及複合材料
description.en: This course is aimed at systematically introducing some important concepts of material engineering for students who were not an engineer training in their BS. The course covers (1)Atomic Bonding and Coordination (2)Crystal Structure (3)Disorder in Solid Phase (4)Phase Equilibria (5)Microstructures (6)Reaction Rate (7)Deformation and Fracture (8)Conducting and Semi-conducting Materials (9)Ceramic Materials (10)Polymer and Composites.

description.zh: 隨工業物聯網的快速發展，越來越多的感測數據得以被記錄，除了依賴專家的經驗判斷，更可藉由數據分析的結果提供決策上的輔助。本課程將介紹資料科學的基本分析架構，從問題定義、數據前處理、特徵工程、模型建立、結果解釋與評估等，除課堂講授資料科學工具與方法外，並利用作業、個案研究、案例資料，以訓練同學資料分析的能力與解決問題的經驗。
description.en: With the advanced technology in Industrial Internet of Things, amount of sensors are installed to collect data during manufacturing production and service process. In addition to rely on domain knowledge, we can also construct a data-driven model and extract useful information and rule for decision support and management.. This course will introduce analytics framework of data science including problem definition, data preprocessing, feature engineering, model construction, and result evaluation and interpretation. In addition to lecture, this course also training students how to analyze the data and problem solving through homework, term project and case studies.

description.zh: 1.醫用電子學之基礎。2.生醫電物理化學之基礎。3.人體生理系統與經絡系統介紹。4.生醫系統電物理化學模型分析。5.醫用電探針、感測器元件與生物晶片的應用。6.量測理論與生醫電訊號量測技術。7.生醫電訊號處理技術。8.超音波、紅外線、X光、CT、磁振醫學造影原理與影像處理。9.醫用電子安全規格製訂。10.醫用醫療儀器與生化分析儀設計。11.DICOM、HL7醫療網路資訊系統介紹。12.中西醫工應用系列介紹。
description.en: 1.Fundamental of medical electronics。2.Fundamental of electro-physiology。3.Introduction to human body system and Meridian system。4.Electronic physics-chemical modeling analysis of   biomedical system。5.Applications of medical electrode、biosensor and biochip。 6.Medical measurement theory and technology。7.Processing technology of biomedical signals。8.Constructing and processing of ultrasound、infrared、X-ray  、CT and MRI Imaging。9.Safety specifications of medical electronic devices。10.Designs of biomed

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹研究電腦輔助設計軟硬體，並藉設計實例演練，以熟悉研究電腦輔助設計軟應體之操作與功能。
description.en: To introduce and study the software of computer-aided-design. By the design project practice, to be adept at the operation and function of computer-aided-design software.

description.zh: 藉由國內外設計競賽主題與產學合作設計案進行實際演練，著重於資料蒐集、商品分析、創新構想與成果表達之進階能力養成，期讓學生在國內外設計競賽舞台上展現光芒，在產學合作中習得實務經驗並獲致產業界肯定。因此本課程旨在以實際演練達成兼具創新性與商品化專業設計能力養成。
description.en: Advanced Product Design (I) educates students to identify and resolve design problems - innovatively and with sensitivity to the social, physical and ecological environment.  Students learn to analyze and solve diverse design problems from technical, aesthetic, social and ecological viewpoints. Students are given the resources to identify, expand and test personal and professional development through an intensive exploration of design ideas.  Innovation is stressed, along with the ability to refine formal design issues.  There are numerous opportunities for students to work with industry through corporate-sponsored studio projects and design competitions.

description.zh: 藉由國內外設計競賽主題與產學合作設計案進行實際演練，著重於資料蒐集、商品分析、創新構想與成果表達之進階能力養成，期讓學生在國內外設計競賽舞台上展現光芒，在產學合作中習得實務經驗並獲致產業界肯定。因此本課程旨在以實際演練達成兼具創新性與商品化專業設計能力養成。
description.en: Advanced Product Design (I) educates students to identify and resolve design problems - innovatively and with sensitivity to the social, physical and ecological environment.  Students learn to analyze and solve diverse design problems from technical, aesthetic, social and ecological viewpoints. Students are given the resources to identify, expand and test personal and professional development through an intensive exploration of design ideas.  Innovation is stressed, along with the ability to refine formal design issues.  There are numerous opportunities for students to work with industry through corporate-sponsored studio projects and design competitions.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹研究電腦輔助設計軟硬體，並藉設計實例演練，以熟悉研究電腦輔助設計軟應體之操作與功能。
description.en: To introduce and study the software of computer-aided-design. By the design project practice, to be adept at the operation and function of computer-aided-design software.

description.zh: 在諸多工程應用實例中，如LED、晶片之散熱問題、流體在能源系統中之熱交換、燃料電池衍生之熱問題等，都與材料之規格選用、處理方法、加工方式、製造過程有明顯的相關性。本門課程主要針對材料工程與熱管理相關的技術問題，提出探討與對策，期使學生對熱管理在材料與系統工程上的應用提供適當的專業知識。
description.en: In engineering applications, such as LED, chip cooling, heat exchange in energy systems, fuel cells, are always comes with the problems of thermal generation. Meanwhile, manufacturing process and heat treatment of these products are also strongly dependent of the selection of material specifications. The purpose of this course would like to employ practical problems and lead the students in finding appropriate solutions or technical approaches to solve the related problems they could meet.

name.zh: 材料特性與熱管理實務應用

notes: 限21人/機電所、機電博合開

description.zh: 介紹最新製造技術中的特殊項目，包括：1、製造實驗及統計分析2、製造設備，強調電腦化的運動控制及製程控制3、電腦化的製造系統，如CAD、CAM、CIM、LAN及因電腦化產生的系統進化。
description.en: Introducing special topics of newest manufacturing technology. Including:1.Manufacturing experiments and statistical evaluation.2.Manufacturing equipment, emphasizing on computerized motion control and process control.3.Computerized manufacturing system, like CAD, CAM, CIM, LAN, and manufacturing system 's evolution due to computerization.

name.en: Special topics of modern manufacturing technology

description.zh: 認識英文學術論文的語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討英文報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on English writings are concerned.

notes: 博士必修,碩士修不計畢業學分。老師行動不便請排1f教

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等。可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

description.zh: 聯合國全球契約(UN Global Compact)於 2004 年首次提出ESG 的概念，由環境(environment)、社會(social)、公司治理(corporate governancer)評估一家企業的永續(sustainability)發展指標，提出如何實踐 CSR 的原則。2008 年全球金融海嘯爆發時，更獲得關注。ESG 為衡量一家企業經營的績效指標，亦即市場參照的投資標準。因此，注重環境永續、社會責任與公司治理的ESG原則，已成全球風潮，更是決定企業未來是否能順利接到訂單之關鍵，也是維繫企業在產業鏈永續發展之命脈。換言之，落實ESG原則，將帶動企業高成長、創造更多的社會福祉。本課程介紹環境永續、社會責任與公司治理面向的理論與實務及其實踐的能力，結合國內企業推動ESG之相關做法與成功發展經驗，進而發掘、陳述、分析ESG如何促使企業創造出新的商業經營模式？推動 ESG 創造企業新價值與股東財富以及公司利潤間如何求取平衡？並進而提供解決問題之能力。
description.en: The UN Global Compact first proposed the concept of ESG in 2004. The environment, social, and corporate governance assess the sustainability development indicators of a corporation and propose how to practice CSR. When the global financial tsunami broke out in 2008, ESG gained more attention. ESG is a performance indicator that measures the operation of an enterprise, that is, the investment standard referenced by the market. Therefore, ESG principles focusing on environmental sustainability, social responsibility and corporate governance have become a global trend. It is also the key to determining whether a corporation can successfully receive orders in the future, and it is also the lifeblood of maintaining the sustainable development of the company in the industry supply-chain. In other words, the implementation of ESG principles will drive high growth of corporation and create more social well-being.This course introduces the theory and practice of environmental sustainability,

description.zh: 1.	建立企業經營管理的基本認知2.	企業管理的經營模式認知3.	導入運用的方法與案例4.	提升學生經營管理能力
description.en: 1.	Establish basic understanding of business management2.	Cognition of business model of enterprise management3.	Methods and cases of introduction and application4.	Improve students' management ability

notes: (群組1)經營與策略管理(聯輔會)，台北上課

description.zh: N
description.en: N

description.zh: 本課程以我國智慧財產局頒布之「專利審查基準」為教材，介紹電腦軟體、醫藥、生物、中草藥之專利申請審查，以及新型專利形式審查和舉發審查。
description.en: The textbook of this course is "Patent Examination Guidelines" which is issued by the Taiwan Intellectual Property Office. We will introduce the examination practice for special patent cases, such as computer software, medicine, biology, and Chinese herbal medicine. In addition, the examination of utility model patent and patent invalidation will also be discussed in this course.

name.en: Examination Guidelines for Patent and Utility Model (III)

description.zh: 本課程將以近期著作權法著名案例的評析，培養學生關鍵的基礎能力，再導入若該著作為人工智慧自行創作或人類以人工智慧為輔具所創作之法律爭議，鼓勵學生從比較法考察及跨域科法整合之觀點，剖析立法、司法或行政所面臨的問題，並探求可能解決問題的具體措施或建議方案。
description.en: This course will analyze recent well-known copyright cases, expecting that relevant fundamental capability of students can be built.  Further, legal issues will be introduced in dealing with the copyright work created by AI itself, or created by human beings who are aided by AI.  Besides, efforts will be made to encourage students to analyze the problems encountered in legislative, judiciary, and administrative sectors, with considerations on comparative law and with viewpoints from integration of law and technology, and to propose concrete measures and suggestions that may help to solve the problems.

description.zh: 本課程將以近期著作權法著名案例的評析，培養學生關鍵的基礎能力，再導入若該著作為人工智慧自行創作或人類以人工智慧為輔具所創作之法律爭議，鼓勵學生從比較法考察及跨域科法整合之觀點，剖析立法、司法或行政所面臨的問題，並探求可能解決問題的具體措施或建議方案。
description.en: This course will analyze recent well-known copyright cases, expecting that relevant fundamental capability of students can be built.  Further, legal issues will be introduced in dealing with the copyright work created by AI itself, or created by human beings who are aided by AI.  Besides, efforts will be made to encourage students to analyze the problems encountered in legislative, judiciary, and administrative sectors, with considerations on comparative law and with viewpoints from integration of law and technology, and to propose concrete measures and suggestions that may help to solve the problems.

description.zh: 本課程將以智慧財產局最新頒佈之「專利侵權判斷要點」為藍本，主要介紹專利侵權判斷流程、專利請求項之解釋、專利侵權之比對與判斷、均等論之限制事項。並輔以國內外案列閱讀與討論，也瞭解未來專利侵害之發展趨勢。。
description.en: Based on "The Essential of Patent Infringement Assessment (2015)" issued by the Taiwan Intellectual Property Office, this course will focus on critical topics, such as the procedure of patent infringement judgement, claims interpretation, comparing the properly interpreted claims to the accused devices, Doctrine of Equivalents and limitations on the Doctrine of Equivalents. Furthermore, through some Taiwan and U.S. infringement cases, participants will be familiar with the trend of patent infringement.

name.zh: 專利侵害鑒定與專利爭訟專題研究
name.en: Seminar on Patent Infringement Assessment and Patent Litigation

description.zh: 本課程將探討(1)智財商業模式與智財交易(2)英美契約法(3)智財授權契約規範(4)授權程序與稽核(5)技術合作契約(6)智財合資契約及章程
description.en: This course will illustrate the following issues: (1) IP Business Model and IP Transactions, (2) Anglo-American Contract Law,  (3) Definition,  Regulation, Types & Management of IP License,  (4)License Agreement Auditing for Licensing Business, (5)  Technical Cooperation Contract, (6) IP Joint Venture Contract and Articles of Association.

name.zh: 國際智權契約與技術移轉

description.zh: 本課程將探討(1)智財商業模式與智財交易(2)英美契約法(3)智財授權契約規範(4)授權程序與稽核(5)技術合作契約(6)智財合資契約及章程
description.en: This course will illustrate the following issues: (1) IP Business Model and IP Transactions, (2) Anglo-American Contract Law,  (3) Definition,  Regulation, Types & Management of IP License,  (4)License Agreement Auditing for Licensing Business, (5)  Technical Cooperation Contract, (6) IP Joint Venture Contract and Articles of Association.

name.zh: 國際智權契約與技術移轉

description.zh: 科技的進步不僅利於人類文明的創新，也考驗當代法律制度是否能確保法正義的理念與法秩序的維持。本課程主要是探討我國與先進國家智慧財產權、公平交易法、消費者保護法、電子商務、網路犯罪與生物科技法律等問題。
description.en: The advance of technology facilitates an innovation of human civilization; in addition, it also proves to be a test of the modern legal system-seeing whether a balance between legal justice and legal order can be maintained. Some important topics available for class discussion are: intellectual property, fair trade law, consumer protection, e-commerce, internet crimes and biological technology.

description.zh: 學生們為研究必需習得的日文能力，此課程包含：(1) 日文閱讀與其文法(2) 紡織術語、複合材料、半導體、生物化學等日文(3) 最近科技研究開發之日文資料
description.en: This course has been designed to provide students essential Japanese language ability for advanced study. The course covers:(1) Japanese reading and its grammar(2) Textile terminology, composite, semiconductor, and biochemistry in Japanese. (3) Japanese references of the latest scientific and technological research and development

description.zh: 本門課程是財務、電腦、與數學的結合，其主要目標為啟發學生如何設計電腦演算法來解決財務或經濟上的問題。一開始，此課程會複習一些基本的知識，如利率期間結構、選擇權評價理論、隨機過程模型、數值方法、與寫程式時所需的資料結構。之後，會講到一些新奇選擇權的演算法，包括亞洲式選擇權，障礙選擇權、回顧選擇權、重設選擇權、彩虹選擇權、可轉換公司債。
description.en: The major goal of this course is to provide students with complete understanding of many financial markets and products. Topics such as forward and futures, swaps, and options will be fully covered. In addition, the basic pricing methods of these innovative products will be emphasized in this course. Finally, even to a MBA student, the knowledge mentioned in this course is sure to be helpful for his (or her) future career.

description.zh: 透過以使用者為中心的理念來設計服務跟介面，本課程會以專案為主讓同學分組實務學習到應學技能
description.en: A project-based introduction to the user interface design process and is oriented toward practical methods for approaching a design problem. The focus of the course is to develop conceptual designs based on the needs of users.

notes: 資財四甲、碩合開 / 請安排六教教室

description.zh: 本課程重點在於台灣專利法的主要法律議題，包括產業利用性、新穎性、進步性、可實施性、說明書支持性、請求項不明確性、請求項解釋、侵權行為、救濟手段、專利授權、強制授權、專利訴訟之展開和舉發。本課程教材包括專利法教科書、智慧局頒發的專利審查基準和智慧財產法院裁判。
description.en: This course focuses on the main legal issues of the Taiwan Patent Law including industrial utility, novelty, inventive step, enablement, written description, claim indefiniteness, claim interpretation, infringement, remedies, patent licensing, compulsory licensing, initiation of patent litigation, and opposition. The class materials include a patent law textbook, patent examination guidelines issued by the Taiwan Intellectual Property Office and recent decisions from the Taiwan Intellectual Property Court.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在於使學員們實際從事復健輔具的設計，製造臨床應用及評估。實作範圍包括：重度腦性麻痺孩童個人特殊坐椅及身體擺位系統之設計，製造與臨床評估，脊髓病患抗壓墊之電腦輔助設計及製造，特殊功能性輪椅之設計與製造，膝上/下義肢之製造及臨床評估， 簡易溝通輔具之設計與製造。期能培養國內極為欠缺之復健科技專才並落實本土化復健科技之研發。
description.en: The objective of this course is to conduct the design, manufacturing, application, and evaluation of assistive devices for rehabilitation. The practices include: design, manufacturing, and evaluation of special chair, posture fixation system, stress relief cushion, special wheelchair, artificial limbs, and communication assistive devices. It is hoped that this course can cultivate domestic specialists and realize localized R&D ability in the area of rehabilitation science and technology.

name.en: Design and Practice of Assistive Devices for Elders

notes: 機電所和機械自動化外生專班合開,莊俊融

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。1.電磁波在介質中的傳導 2.光纖光學 3.光纖種類及特性 4.發光器5.接收器 6.中繼站及光放大器 7.光纖通訊系統 8.光纖網路
description.en: 1.Electromagnetic ware propagation in media 2.Fiber optics 3.Characteristics of optic fibers 4.Optical emitter 5. Optical receiver 6.Repeater and optical amplifier 7.Optical fiber communication 8.Optical fiber network

description.zh: 本課程重點在於台灣專利法的主要法律議題，包括產業利用性、新穎性、進步性、可實施性、說明書支持性、請求項不明確性、請求項解釋、侵權行為、救濟手段、專利授權、強制授權、專利訴訟之展開和舉發。本課程教材包括專利法教科書、智慧局頒發的專利審查基準和智慧財產法院裁判。
description.en: This course focuses on the main legal issues of the Taiwan Patent Law including industrial utility, novelty, inventive step, enablement, written description, claim indefiniteness, claim interpretation, infringement, remedies, patent licensing, compulsory licensing, initiation of patent litigation, and opposition. The class materials include a patent law textbook, patent examination guidelines issued by the Taiwan Intellectual Property Office and recent decisions from the Taiwan Intellectual Property Court.

description.zh: 輔具是輔助器具的簡稱，舉凡日常生活，能使活動更容易、方便的各種用具皆屬之，正確的使用輔具可以改變身心障礙者或老年人原本有障礙的生活，走入社會，降低社會成本。本課程為專案導向課程，課程中除教授輔具設計基本概念，透過實際個案訪談分析目標對象，以工作坊形式找出使用者痛點，進而發展解決方案，提出適切的輔具資源，以幫助身心障礙者或老年人族群。
description.en: Assistive device is the abbreviation of auxiliary equipment. For everyday life, all kinds of utensils that make activities easier and convenient belong to it. Correct use of assistive device can change the life of people with physical and mental disabilities or the elderly who have obstacles, and enter the society and reduce Social costs. This is a project-oriented course. The course introduces the concept of auxiliary equipment; students can also analyze target audience through different case studies. During workshops, it helps students indicate users’ pain points and develop the solutions. The goal of this course is to come out with the resources to help people with disabilities or the elderly.

notes: 前六週上課地點為北醫，大研合開

description.zh: 隨著高齡化社會的來臨與國家對於身心障礙者生活福祉的重視，輔助科技相關資源與人才需求日益倍增，各類輔具產品使用已成為這些族群在醫療照護上與生活品質提升上不可或缺的一環。本門課程為「生醫輔助科技跨域微學程」之入門基礎課程，建立學生對輔助科技有基本的通盤認識，期許未來具備相關能力投入輔助創新產品研發。若未來有志投入輔助科技相關產業工作，建議微學程可由此門課程開始選修。由於輔助科技涵蓋醫學與工程相關領域專業知識技術的整合，故由本校與臺北醫學大學攜手合作，兩校多位教師一同共授，提供兩校各20位學生選修，以促進學生或教師間的交流合作，本課程上課地點除了在本校，將有部分週次於北醫校園上課。
description.en: With the advent of aging society and the country's emphasis on the well-being of people with physical and mental disabilities, the demand of assistive technology resources and manpower is getting increased. The use of various assistive products has become an indispensable part for these people in medical care and quality of life. Assistive technology covers and integrates expertise in medicine and engineering related fields. The aims of this course are to let students have the comprehensive understanding of the current status and future trends of assistive technology. This course is the basic course for the “Assistive Technology Interdisciplinary Program”. If students consider to involve assistive technology-related industries in the future, we encourage students to enroll this course.

notes: 前9週至北醫上課，後9週於北科上課，大研合開

description.zh: 本課程的目的是幫助學生發展創新和創業思維能力。本課程是以美國巴布森學院的創新創業課程為基礎。它使學生能夠快速了解創業所需的知識和技能，例如創業思維方式，自我理解，人際網絡，商業模式等能力。並在跨領域雙師的指導下，學習跨領域設計思考和溝通技巧的核心概念。我們希望本課程可以培訓新時代的跨學通才，並提高他們的競爭力。此課程為未來進入職涯架構接軌機制，也為產業注入強而有力的新能量。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to help students to develop innovation and entrepreneurial thinking ability. The course is based on the entrepreneurship program courses from Babson College in the United States. It allows students to quickly understand the knowledge and skills needed for entrepreneurship such as mindset of entrepreneurship, self-understanding, network, business models, and to deliver the core concept of interdisciplinary design thinking and communication skills under the teaching of dual-instructors. We expect that this course can train new era interdisciplinary polymaths and enhance their competitiveness. This course also integrates students into the career track in the near future, and inject new power into the industry which is benefit to the society.

name.zh: 人本設計：創新創業設計思考跨域
name.en: Human-oriented Design: Interdisciplinary Experience Course of Innovative and Entrepreneurial Design

description.zh: 本課程之目標為透過課堂講授、移地教學以及設計思考工作坊之操作，讓學生能透過大學社會責任專案的導入，以社會設計理論為基礎，教育部苗圃計畫跨域設計思考工作坊為教學途徑，習得執行社會設計創新思考之知識與實作。課程的安排包含社會設計以及設計思考4D流程 (discover, define, develop and deliver) 的講授，雙師雙日跨域工作坊的執行，師生實際至主題操作的場域進行現地踏查以掌握與分析實際的問題，最後藉由創新提案的發表提交課程的成果。本課程期望能培養學生跨域整合知識應用與實作、以及創新思考問題解決的能力。
description.en: This course aims to allow students to understand the knowledge and practice of social design thinking by means of lecturing, field study and design thinking workshop. This course will be supported by the Miaopu project and University Social Responsibility Project, with the aim to incorporate cross-discipline design thinking and social design practicing. The course includes lecturing of social design theory and 4D (discover, define, develop and deliver) process of design thinking, two-day workshop and field study of aboriginal tribe. The outcome of this course is the proposal of innovative solution based on the problems uncovering by the workshop. It is expected that students can obtain the capability of applying cross-discipline knowledge and innovative problem-soving.

description.zh: 本課程介紹大數據在各個領域決策制定的應用，課程內容包括大數據分析與應用、大數據管理、大數據分法與策略、資料探勘介紹、資料探勘方法、大數據平台、大數據行銷實務、大數據個案分析、期末專題製作與報告。學生可以經由多個案例學習大數據的應用實務、目前技術與未來發展方向。
description.en: This course explores the rapidly developing fields of big data for the efficiency of decision making in various fields. The topics are about basic concepts of data manipulations, analytic, and communications which are including: introduction to big data; basic knowledge of data mining; special topics of big data in business Analytics, and data analytic project. The course will help students careful consideration of what is desired from big data, how big data analytic to add value to business, etc. Students can gain a strong data science knowledge set and techniques via in-depth case studies, most current readings and experiences, and most current and future technology exploration.

description.zh: 為了鼓勵以及幫助學生用技術或者商業模式，聯合學校老師或是跨校同學，用商業的手段共同解決社會或者商業問題，本課程將以衝刺班的形式，邀請有創業經驗的老師、業師，透過工作坊的形式，幫助學生逐週的推進創業進度以及創業競賽演練，目標是幫助學生落實創業想法，應用在社會中並且帶來改變。
description.en: To encourage and help students using new technologies or new business models to solve problems in the society and the business world, this intense, pre-accelerator, 18-week course invites different professors and mentors with entrepreneurship experiences to help students develop their start-up ideas through workshops and startup competitions. The goal of this course is to help students realize their ideas and create actionable business solutions that can change the society.

description.zh: 本課程以個案研究和文獻探討方式讓學生了解總體經濟的環境（包括GDP、GNP、失業率、景氣循環、通貨膨脹、政府的財政政策和貨幣政策的規劃與制定、匯率制度、總合供給與需求等課題）。
description.en: This course is to analyze the macroeconomic policy, international economy, business cycles, government policy, exchange rate and other macroeconomic-related issues. The course will be taught with case studies and journal literature. Group discussions are needed.

description.zh: 教學目標課程目標：執行計劃的現金流量計劃，並通過提供的財務指標進行分析，從而可以就是否方便執行項目做出全面的決策。在本主題中，模型和項目評估標準為決策提供了必要的要素，尤其是在是否實施投資項目方面。學會識別和定義投資項目的主要成本效益參數”
description.en: Course Objectives：Execute a projected Cash flow planning, analyzing it by the Provided financial indicators that allow comprehensive decisions to be made on whether or not the execution of projects is convenient.In this subject the models and Project evaluation criteria that provide the necessary elements for decision-making, particularly on whether or not to implement investment projects. Learn to identify and define the main cost-benefit parameters of an investment project "

description.zh: 本課程為ㄧ跨文化、跨領域及跨國界的實務導向課程，藉由實際執行讓學生面對未來職業生涯作好充分的準備。課程結構涵蓋二個主軸：(進階課程)(1)透過創意活動、分組、獎勵競賽等方式，實際讓學生管理與執行，從領導力的培訓、到真實企業中要求的基本執行力培訓，把理論與實務互相結合，達到所謂的Learning by Doing；(2)股票、外匯、期貨、債卷為全世界四大金融市場，本堂課將以最大的金融市場(外匯)為例，並提供市場上真實的投資工具&軟體，一步步讓學生了解何謂真正的投資操作以及要注意的地方；並提供具體的基本與技術面工具與使用方法，培養學生分析判斷市場趨勢，逐步帶領學生成為市場的贏家。
description.en: This course is a cross-cultural, cross-disciplinary and cross-border practice-oriented course that prepares students for future careers through practical implementation. (Advanced)The course structure covers two main axes:(1) Through the creative activities, grouping, award competition, etc., the students are actually managed and executed, from the training of leadership to the basic executive training required in real enterprises, combining theory and practice to achieve the so-called Learning by Doing;(2) Stocks, foreign exchange, futures, and bonds are the world's four major financial markets. This class will take the largest financial market (foreign exchange) as an example, and provide real investment tools & software on the market, step by step for students to understand what is meant. Real investment operations and places to pay attention to; provide specific basic and technical tools and methods of use, train students to analyze and judge market trends, and gradually lead

description.zh: 本課程是為了訓練學生具有敏銳的觀察能力及細密的思考能力，瞭解美國生涯與技術教育和臺灣技職教育的差異，並提升學生國際視野。課程內容包含美國生涯及技術教育的發展、生涯及技術教育課程/教學和評估、美國勞動力發展與教育系統分析、人力資源開發等。
description.en: This course is understanding career and technical education in the United States. It highlights the difference between the United States and Taiwan. It also discusses how to evaluate and teach career and technical education course, education system analysis, and development aspects of human resource.

name.en: Career and Technical Education of United States

notes: 碩博課程, Christopher J. Zirkle教授 全英文短期授課【停開】
